   22: %%
   23: %% ct:run("../inets_test", httpc_SUITE).
   24: %%
   25: 
   26: -module(httpc_SUITE).
   27: 
   28: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
   29: -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl").
   30: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   31: -include("inets_test_lib.hrl").
   32: -include("http_internal.hrl").
   33: -include("httpc_internal.hrl").
   34: %% Note: This directive should only be used in test suites.
   35: -compile([export_all, nowarn_export_all]).
   36: 
   37: -define(URL_START, "http://").
   38: -define(TLS_URL_START, "https://").
   39: -define(NOT_IN_USE_PORT, 8997).
   40: -define(profile(Config), proplists:get_value(profile, Config, httpc:default_profile())).
   41: 
   42: -define(SSL_NO_VERIFY, {ssl, [{verify, verify_none}]}).
   43: 
   44: %% Using hardcoded file path to keep it below 107 characters
   45: %% (maximum length supported by erlang)
   46: -define(UNIX_SOCKET, "/tmp/inets_httpc_SUITE.sock").
   47: 
   48: -record(sslsocket, {fd = nil, pid = nil}).
   49: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   50: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   51: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   52: suite() ->
   53:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   54:      {timetrap,{seconds, 30}}
   55:     ].
   56: 
   57: all() ->
   58:     [
   59:      {group, http},
   60:      {group, http_ipv6},
   61:      {group, sim_http},
   62:      {group, sim_http_process_leak},
   63:      {group, sim_http_ipv6},
   64:      {group, http_internal},
   65:      {group, http_unix_socket},
   66:      {group, https},
   67:      {group, sim_https},
   68:      {group, misc},
   69:      {group, sim_mixed} % HTTP and HTTPS sim servers
   70:     ].
   71: 
   72: groups() ->
   73:     [
   74:      {http, [parallel], real_requests()},
   75:      {http_ipv6, [parallel], [request_options]},
   76:      {sim_http, [parallel], only_simulated() ++ server_closing_connection()},
   77:      {sim_http_process_leak, [process_leak_on_keepalive]},
   78:      {sim_http_ipv6, [parallel], only_simulated() ++ server_closing_connection()
   79:           % The following two tests are not functional on IPv6 yet:
   80:           % ++ [process_leak_on_keepalive]
   81:           -- [server_closing_connection_on_second_response]
   82:           },
   83:      {http_internal, [parallel], real_requests_esi()},
   84:      {http_internal_minimum_bytes, [parallel], [remote_socket_close_parallel]},
   85:      {http_unix_socket, [parallel], simulated_unix_socket()},
   86:      {https, [parallel], [def_ssl_opt | real_requests()]},
   87:      {sim_https, [parallel], only_simulated()},
   88:      {misc, [parallel], misc()},
   89:      {sim_mixed, [parallel], sim_mixed()}
   90:     ].
   91: 
   92: real_requests()->
   93:     [
   94:      head,
   95:      get,
   96:      get_query_string,
   97:      post,
   98:      delete,
   99:      post_stream,
  100:      patch,
  101:      async,
  102:      pipeline,
  103:      persistent_connection,
  104:      save_to_file,
  105:      save_to_file_async,
  106:      page_does_not_exist,
  107:      emulate_lower_versions,
  108:      headers,
  109:      headers_as_is,
  110:      header_type_0,
  111:      header_type_1,
  112:      header_type_2,
  113:      header_type_3,
  114:      header_type_4,
  115:      header_type_5,
  116:      header_type_6,
  117:      header_type_7,
  118:      header_type_8,
  119:      header_type_9,
  120:      header_type_10,
  121:      header_type_11,
  122:      header_type_12,
  123:      header_type_13,
  124:      header_type_14,
  125:      header_type_15,
  126:      header_type_16,
  127:      header_type_17,
  128:      header_type_18,
  129:      header_type_19,
  130:      header_type_20,
  131:      header_type_21,
  132:      header_type_22,
  133:      header_type_23,
  134:      empty_body,
  135:      stream,
  136:      stream_to_pid,
  137:      stream_through_fun,
  138:      stream_through_mfa,
  139:      streaming_error,
  140:      inet_opts,
  141:      invalid_headers,
  142:      invalid_headers_key,
  143:      invalid_headers_value,
  144:      invalid_body,
  145:      invalid_body_fun,
  146:      invalid_method,
  147:      no_scheme,
  148:      invalid_uri,
  149:      binary_url,
  150:      iolist_body
  151:     ].
  152: 
  153: real_requests_esi() ->
  154:     [slow_connection].
  155: 
  156: simulated_unix_socket() ->
  157:     [unix_domain_socket].
  158: 
  159: only_simulated() ->
  160:     [
  161:      cookie,
  162:      cookie_profile,
  163:      empty_set_cookie,
  164:      invalid_set_cookie,
  165:      trace,
  166:      stream_once,
  167:      stream_single_chunk,
  168:      stream_no_length,
  169:      not_streamed_once,
  170:      stream_large_not_200_or_206,
  171:      no_content_204,
  172:      tolerate_missing_CR,
  173:      userinfo,
  174:      bad_response,
  175:      timeout_redirect,
  176:      internal_server_error,
  177:      invalid_http,
  178:      invalid_chunk_size,
  179:      headers_dummy,
  180:      headers_with_obs_fold,
  181:      headers_conflict_chunked_with_length,
  182:      empty_response_header,
  183:      remote_socket_close,
  184:      remote_socket_close_async,
  185:      transfer_encoding,
  186:      transfer_encoding_identity,
  187:      redirect_loop,
  188:      redirect_moved_permanently,
  189:      redirect_multiple_choises,
  190:      redirect_found,
  191:      redirect_see_other,
  192:      redirect_temporary_redirect,
  193:      redirect_permanent_redirect,
  194:      redirect_relative_uri,
  195:      port_in_host_header,
  196:      redirect_port_in_host_header,
  197:      relaxed,
  198:      multipart_chunks,
  199:      get_space,
  200:      delete_no_body,
  201:      post_with_content_type,
  202:      stream_fun_server_close
  203:     ].
  204: 
  205: server_closing_connection() ->
  206:     [
  207:      server_closing_connection_on_first_response,
  208:      server_closing_connection_on_second_response
  209:     ].
  210: 
  211: misc() ->
  212:     [
  213:      server_does_not_exist,
  214:      timeout_memory_leak,
  215:      wait_for_whole_response,
  216:      post_204_chunked,
  217:      head_chunked_empty_body,
  218:      head_empty_body,
  219:      chunkify_fun
  220:     ].
  221: 
  222: sim_mixed() ->
  223:     [
  224:      redirect_http_to_https,
  225:      redirect_relative_different_port
  226:     ].
  227: 
  228: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  229: 
  230: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  231:     logger:set_primary_config(level, warning),
  232:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  233:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  234:     inets_test_lib:start_apps([inets]),
  235:     ServerRoot = filename:join(PrivDir, "server_root"),
  236:     DocRoot = filename:join(ServerRoot, "htdocs"),
  237:     setup_server_dirs(ServerRoot, DocRoot, DataDir),
  238:     [{server_root, ServerRoot}, {doc_root, DocRoot}  | Config].
  239: 
  240: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  241:     inets_test_lib:stop_apps([inets]),
  242:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  243:     inets_test_lib:del_dirs(PrivDir),
  244:     ok.
  245: 
  246: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  247: init_per_group(misc = Group, Config) ->
  248:     start_apps(Group),
  249:     Inet = inet_version(),
  250:     [{httpc_options, [{ipfamily, Inet}]} | Config];
  251: init_per_group(Group, Config0) when Group =:= sim_https; Group =:= https;
  252:                                     Group =:= sim_mixed ->
  253:     catch application:stop(crypto),
  254:     try application:start(crypto) of
  255:         ok ->
  256:             start_apps(Group),
  257:             HttpcOptions = [{keep_alive_timeout, 50000}, {max_keep_alive_length, 5}],
  258:             [{httpc_options, HttpcOptions} | do_init_per_group(Group, Config0)]
  259:     catch
  260:         _:_ ->
  261:             {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  262:     end;
  263: init_per_group(http_unix_socket = Group, Config0) ->
  264:     case os:type() of
  265:         {win32,_} ->
  266:             {skip, "Unix Domain Sockets are not supported on Windows"};
  267:         _ ->
  268:             file:delete(?UNIX_SOCKET),
  269:             start_apps(Group),
  270:             Config = proplists:delete(port, Config0),
  271:             {Pid, Port, HttpcOpts} = server_start(Group, server_config(Group, Config)),
  272:             lists:append([{dummy_server_pid, Pid}, {port, Port}, {httpc_options, HttpcOpts}],
  273:                          Config)
  274:     end;
  275: init_per_group(Group, Config0) when Group == http_ipv6;
  276:                                     Group == sim_http_ipv6 ->
  277:     case is_ipv6_supported() of
  278:         true ->
  279:             start_apps(Group),
  280:             Config = proplists:delete(port, Config0),
  281:             Port = server_start(Group, server_config(Group, Config)),
  282:             [{port, Port}, {request_opts, [{socket_opts, [{ipfamily, inet6}]}]} | Config];
  283:         false ->
  284:             {skip, "Host does not support IPv6"}
  285:      end;
  286: init_per_group(Group, Config0) ->
  287:     start_apps(Group),
  288:     Config = proplists:delete(port, Config0),
  289:     Port = server_start(Group, server_config(Group, Config)),
  290:     [{port, Port} | Config].
  291: 
  292: end_per_group(_, _Config) ->
  293:     ok.
  294: 
  295: do_init_per_group(Group=sim_mixed, Config0) ->
  296:     % The mixed group uses two server ports (http and https), so we use
  297:     % different config names here.
  298:     Config1 = init_ssl(Config0),
  299:     Config2 = proplists:delete(http_port, proplists:delete(https_port, Config1)),
  300:     {HttpPort, HttpsPort} = server_start(Group, server_config(sim_https, Config2)),
  301:     [{http_port, HttpPort} | [{https_port, HttpsPort} | Config2]];
  302: do_init_per_group(Group, Config0) ->
  303:     Config1 =
  304:         case Group of
  305:             https ->
  306:                 init_ssl(Config0);
  307:             sim_https ->
  308:                 init_ssl(Config0);
  309:             _ ->
  310:                 Config0
  311:         end,
  312:     Config = proplists:delete(port, Config1),
  313:     Port = server_start(Group, server_config(Group, Config)),
  314:     [{port, Port} | Config].
  315: 
  316: init_ssl(Config) ->
  317:     ClientFileBase = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), "client"]),
  318:     ServerFileBase = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), "server"]),
  319:     GenCertData =
  320:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  321:                                         #{root => [{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)},
  322:                                                    {digest, sha256}],
  323:                                           intermediates => [[{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)},
  324:                                                              {digest, sha256}]],
  325:                                           peer => [{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)},
  326:                                                    {digest, sha256}]
  327:                                          },
  328:                                     client_chain =>
  329:                                         #{root => [{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4)},
  330:                                                    {digest, sha256}],
  331:                                           intermediates => [[{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)},
  332:                                                              {digest, sha256}]],
  333:                                           peer => [{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6)},{digest, sha256}]}}),
  334:     Conf = inets_test_lib:gen_pem_config_files(GenCertData, ClientFileBase, ServerFileBase),
  335:     [{ssl_conf, Conf} | Config].
  336: 
  337: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  338: init_per_testcase(Name, Config) when Name == pipeline; Name == persistent_connection ->
  339:     inets:start(httpc, [{profile, Name}]),
  340:     GivenOptions = proplists:get_value(httpc_options, Config, []),
  341:     ok = httpc:set_options([{pipeline_timeout, 50000},
  342:                             {max_pipeline_length, 3} | GivenOptions], Name),
  343: 
  344:     [{profile, Name} | Config];
  345: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  346:     {ok, _Pid} = inets:start(httpc, [{profile, Case}]),
  347:     GivenOptions = proplists:get_value(httpc_options, Config, []),
  348:     ok = httpc:set_options(GivenOptions, Case),
  349:     [{profile, Case} | Config].
  350: 
  351: end_per_testcase(Case, Config)
  352:   when Case == server_closing_connection_on_first_response;
  353:        Case == server_closing_connection_on_second_response ->
  354:     %% Test case uses at most one session.  Ensure no leftover
  355:     %% sessions left behind.
  356:     {_, Status} = proplists:lookup(tc_status, Config),
  357:     ShallCleanup = case Status of
  358:                        ok -> true;
  359:                        {failed, _} -> true;
  360:                        {skipped, _} -> false
  361:                    end,
  362:     if ShallCleanup =:= true ->
  363:             httpc:request(url(group_name(Config), "/just_close.html", Config), ?profile(Config)),
  364:             ok;
  365:        true ->
  366:             ct:log("Not cleaning up because test case status was ~p", [Status]),
  367:             ok
  368:     end,
  369:     inets:stop(httpc, ?config(profile, Config));
  370: 
  371: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  372:     inets:stop(httpc, ?config(profile, Config)).
  373: 
  374: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  375: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  376: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  377: head() ->
  378:     [{doc, "Test http head request against local server."}].
  379: 
  380: head(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  381:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
  382:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], []}} = httpc:request(head, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  383:                                                    [], ?profile(Config)).
  384: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  385: get() ->
  386:     [{doc, "Test http get request against local server"}].
  387: get(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  388:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
  389:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], Body = [_ | _]}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  390:                                                                [], ?profile(Config)),
  391: 
  392:     inets_test_lib:check_body(Body),
  393: 
  394:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], BinBody}} =  httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  395:                                                          [{body_format, binary}], ?profile(Config)),
  396:     true = is_binary(BinBody).
  397: 
  398: 
  399: get_query_string() ->
  400:     [{doc, "Test http get request with query string against local server"}].
  401: get_query_string(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  402:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html?foo=bar", Config), []},
  403:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], Body = [_ | _]}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  404:                                                                [], ?profile(Config)),
  405: 
  406:     inets_test_lib:check_body(Body).
  407: 
  408: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  409: get_space() ->
  410:     [{"Test http get request with '%20' in the path of the URL."}].
  411: get_space(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  412:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/space%20.html", Config), []},
  413:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  414:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], Body = [_ | _]}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  415:                                                                RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)),
  416: 
  417:     inets_test_lib:check_body(Body).
  418: 
  419: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  420: post() ->
  421:     [{doc, "Test http post request against local server. We do in this case "
  422:      "only care about the client side of the the post. The server "
  423:      "script will not actually use the post data."}, {timetrap, timer:seconds(30)}].
  424: post(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  425:     CGI = case os:type() of
  426: 	      {win32, _} ->
  427: 		  "/cgi-bin/cgi_echo.exe";
  428: 	      _ ->
  429: 		  "/cgi-bin/cgi_echo"
  430: 	  end,
  431: 
  432:      URL = url(group_name(Config), CGI, Config),
  433: 
  434:     %% Cgi-script expects the body length to be 100
  435:     Body = lists:duplicate(100, "1"),
  436: 
  437:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_ | _]}} =
  438: 	httpc:request(post, {URL, [{"expect","100-continue"}],
  439: 			     "text/plain", Body}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [], ?profile(Config)),
  440: 
  441:     {ok, {{_,504,_}, [_ | _], []}} =
  442: 	httpc:request(post, {URL, [{"expect","100-continue"}],
  443: 			     "text/plain", "foobar"}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [], ?profile(Config)).
  444: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  445: delete() ->
  446:     [{doc, "Test http delete request against local server. We do in this case "
  447:      "only care about the client side of the the delete. The server "
  448:      "script will not actually use the delete data."}, {timetrap, timer:seconds(30)}].
  449: delete(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  450:     CGI = case os:type() of
  451:           {win32, _} ->
  452:           "/cgi-bin/cgi_echo.exe";
  453:           _ ->
  454:           "/cgi-bin/cgi_echo"
  455:       end,
  456: 
  457:     URL  = url(group_name(Config), CGI, Config),
  458:     Body = lists:duplicate(100, "1"),
  459: 
  460:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_ | _]}} =
  461:     httpc:request(delete, {URL, [{"expect","100-continue"}],
  462:                  "text/plain", Body}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [], ?profile(Config)),
  463: 
  464:     {ok, {{_,504,_}, [_ | _], []}} =
  465:     httpc:request(delete, {URL, [{"expect","100-continue"}],
  466:                  "text/plain", "foobar"}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [], ?profile(Config)).
  467: 
  468: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  469: patch() ->
  470:     [{"Test http patch request against local server. We do in this case "
  471:      "only care about the client side of the the patch. The server "
  472:      "script will not actually use the patch data."}].
  473: patch(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  474:     CGI = case os:type() of
  475: 	      {win32, _} ->
  476: 		  "/cgi-bin/cgi_echo.exe";
  477: 	      _ ->
  478: 		  "/cgi-bin/cgi_echo"
  479: 	  end,
  480: 
  481:      URL = url(group_name(Config), CGI, Config),
  482: 
  483:     %% Cgi-script expects the body length to be 100
  484:     Body = lists:duplicate(100, "1"),
  485: 
  486:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_ | _]}} =
  487: 	httpc:request(patch, {URL, [{"expect","100-continue"}],
  488: 			     "text/plain", Body}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [], ?profile(Config)).
  489: 
  490: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  491: post_stream() ->
  492:     [{doc, "Test streaming http post request against local server. "
  493:      "We only care about the client side of the the post. "
  494:      "The server script will not actually use the post data."}, {timetrap, timer:seconds(30)}].
  495: post_stream(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  496:     CGI = case os:type() of
  497: 	      {win32, _} ->
  498: 		  "/cgi-bin/cgi_echo.exe";
  499: 	      _ ->
  500: 		  "/cgi-bin/cgi_echo"
  501: 	  end,
  502: 
  503:      URL = url(group_name(Config), CGI, Config),
  504: 
  505:     %% Cgi-script expects the body length to be 100
  506:     BodyFun = fun(0) ->
  507: 		      eof;
  508: 		 (LenLeft) ->
  509: 		      {ok, lists:duplicate(10, "1"), LenLeft - 10}
  510: 	      end,
  511: 
  512:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_ | _]}} =
  513: 	httpc:request(post, {URL,
  514: 			     [{"expect", "100-continue"},
  515: 			      {"content-length", "100"}],
  516: 			     "text/plain", {BodyFun, 100}}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [], ?profile(Config)),
  517: 
  518:     {ok, {{_,504,_}, [_ | _], []}} =
  519: 	httpc:request(post, {URL,
  520: 			     [{"expect", "100-continue"},
  521: 			      {"content-length", "10"}],
  522: 			     "text/plain", {BodyFun, 10}}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [], ?profile(Config)).
  523: 
  524: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  525: trace() ->
  526:     [{doc, "Perform a TRACE request."}].
  527: trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  528:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/trace.html", Config), []},
  529:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  530:     case httpc:request(trace, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)) of
  531: 	{ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], "TRACE /trace.html" ++ _}} ->
  532: 	    ok;
  533: 	 Other ->
  534: 	    ct:fail({unexpected, Other})
  535:     end.  
  536: 
  537: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  538: 
  539: pipeline(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  540:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
  541:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [], ?profile(Config)),
  542: 
  543:     %% Make sure pipeline session is registered
  544:     ct:sleep(4000),
  545:     keep_alive_requests(Request, pipeline).
  546: 
  547: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  548: 
  549: persistent_connection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  550:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
  551:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [], ?profile(Config)),
  552: 
  553:     %% Make sure pipeline session is registered
  554:     ct:sleep(4000),
  555:     keep_alive_requests(Request, persistent_connection).
  556: 
  557: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  558: async() ->
  559:     [{doc, "Test an asynchrony http request."}].
  560: async(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  561:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
  562: 
  563:     {ok, RequestId} =
  564: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}], ?profile(Config)),
  565:     Body =
  566: 	receive
  567: 	    {http, {RequestId, {{_, 200, _}, _, BinBody}}} ->
  568: 		BinBody;
  569: 	    {http, Msg} ->
  570: 		ct:fail(Msg)
  571: 	end,
  572:     inets_test_lib:check_body(binary_to_list(Body)),
  573:     {ok, RequestId2} =
  574:     httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}, {full_result, false}], ?profile(Config)),
  575:     Body2 =
  576:     receive
  577:         {http, {RequestId2, 200, BinBody2}} ->
  578:         BinBody2;
  579:         {http, Msg2} ->
  580:         ct:fail(Msg2)
  581: 	end,
  582:     inets_test_lib:check_body(binary_to_list(Body2)),
  583:     {ok, NewRequestId} =
  584: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}]),
  585:     ok = httpc:cancel_request(NewRequestId).
  586: 
  587: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  588: save_to_file() ->
  589:     [{doc, "Test to save the http body to a file"}].
  590: save_to_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  591:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  592:     FilePath = filename:join(PrivDir, "dummy.html"),
  593:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config),
  594:     Request = {URL, []},
  595:     {ok, saved_to_file}
  596: 	= httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{stream, FilePath}], ?profile(Config)),
  597:     {ok, Bin} = file:read_file(FilePath),
  598:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], Body}} = httpc:request(URL, ?profile(Config)),
  599:     Bin == Body.
  600: 
  601: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  602: save_to_file_async() ->
  603:     [{doc,"Test to save the http body to a file"}].
  604: save_to_file_async(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  605:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  606:     FilePath = filename:join(PrivDir, "dummy.html"),
  607:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config),
  608:     Request = {URL, []},
  609:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
  610:     {ok, RequestId} = httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  611: 				    [{stream, FilePath},
  612: 				     {sync, false}], Profile),
  613:     receive
  614: 	{http, {RequestId, saved_to_file}} ->
  615: 	    ok;
  616: 	{http, Msg} ->
  617: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
  618:     end,
  619: 
  620:     {ok, Bin} = file:read_file(FilePath),
  621:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], Body}} = httpc:request(URL, Profile),
  622:     Bin == Body.
  623: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  624: stream() ->
  625:     [{doc, "Test the option stream for asynchrony requests"}].
  626: stream(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  627:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
  628:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  629:     stream_test(Request, {stream, self}, RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)).
  630: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  631: stream_once() ->
  632:     [{doc, "Test the option stream for asynchrony requests"}].
  633: stream_once(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  634:     Request0  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
  635:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  636:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
  637:     stream_test(Request0, {stream, {self, once}}, RequestOpts, Profile),
  638: 
  639:     Request1  = {url(group_name(Config), "/once.html", Config), []},
  640:     stream_test(Request1, {stream, {self, once}}, RequestOpts, Profile),
  641: 
  642:     Request2  = {url(group_name(Config), "/once_chunked.html", Config), []},
  643:     stream_test(Request2, {stream, {self, once}}, RequestOpts, Profile).
  644: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  645: stream_single_chunk() ->
  646:     [{doc, "Test the option stream for asynchrony requests"}].
  647: stream_single_chunk(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  648:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/single_chunk.html", Config), []},
  649:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  650:     stream_test(Request, {stream, self}, RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)).
  651: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  652: stream_no_length() ->
  653:     [{doc, "Test the option stream for asynchrony requests with HTTP 1.0 "
  654:       "body end on closed connection" }].
  655: stream_no_length(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  656:     Request1 = {url(group_name(Config), "/http_1_0_no_length_single.html", Config), []},
  657:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  658:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
  659:     stream_test(Request1, {stream, self}, RequestOpts, Profile),
  660:     Request2 = {url(group_name(Config), "/http_1_0_no_length_multiple.html", Config), []},
  661:     stream_test(Request2, {stream, self}, RequestOpts, Profile).
  662: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  663: stream_large_not_200_or_206() ->
  664:     [{doc, "Test the option stream for large responses with status codes "
  665:       "other than 200 or 206" }].
  666: stream_large_not_200_or_206(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  667:     Request = {url(group_name(Config), "/large_404_response.html", Config), []},
  668:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  669:     {404, _} = not_streamed_test(Request, {stream, self}, RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)).
  670: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  671: not_streamed_once() ->
  672:     [{doc, "Test not streamed responses with once streaming"}].
  673: not_streamed_once(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  674:     Request0 = {url(group_name(Config), "/404.html", Config), []},
  675:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  676:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
  677:     {404, _} = not_streamed_test(Request0, {stream, {self, once}}, RequestOpts, Profile),
  678:     Request1 = {url(group_name(Config), "/404_chunked.html", Config), []},
  679:     {404, _} = not_streamed_test(Request1, {stream, {self, once}}, RequestOpts, Profile).
  680:

  682: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  683: redirect_multiple_choises() ->
  684:     [{doc, "The user agent, selection of the most appropriate choice MAY "
  685:       "be performed automatically."}].
  686: redirect_multiple_choises(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  687:     URL300 = url(group_name(Config), "/300.html", Config),
  688:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  689:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
  690: 
  691:     catch {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}}
  692: 	= httpc:request(get, {URL300, []}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
  693: 
  694:     {ok, {{_,300,_}, [_ | _], _}} =
  695: 	httpc:request(get, {URL300, []}, [{autoredirect, false},?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  696:                       RequestOpts, Profile).
  697: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  698: redirect_moved_permanently() ->
  699:     [{doc, "The server SHOULD generate a Location header field in the response "
  700:       "containing a preferred URI reference for the new permanent URI.  The user "
  701:       "agent MAY use the Location field value for automatic redirection.  The server's " 
  702:       "response payload usually contains a short hypertext note with a "
  703:       "hyperlink to the new URI(s)."}].
  704: redirect_moved_permanently(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  705: 
  706:     URL301 = url(group_name(Config), "/301.html", Config),
  707:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  708:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
  709: 
  710:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}}
  711: 	= httpc:request(get, {URL301, []}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
  712: 
  713:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], []}}
  714: 	= httpc:request(head, {URL301, []}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
  715: 
  716:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}}
  717: 	= httpc:request(post, {URL301, [],"text/plain", "foobar"},
  718: 			[?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile).
  719: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------

  839: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  840: redirect_http_to_https() ->
  841:     [{doc, "Test that a 30X redirect from one scheme to another is handled "
  842:       "correctly."}].
  843: redirect_http_to_https(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  844:     URL301 = mixed_url(http, "/301_custom_url.html", Config),
  845:     TargetUrl = mixed_url(https, "/dummy.html", Config),
  846:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  847:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
  848:     Headers = [{"x-test-301-url", TargetUrl}],
  849: 
  850:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}}
  851: 	= httpc:request(get, {URL301, Headers}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
  852: 
  853:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], []}}
  854: 	= httpc:request(head, {URL301, Headers}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
  855: 
  856:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}}
  857: 	= httpc:request(post, {URL301, Headers, "text/plain", "foobar"},
  858: 			[?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile).
  859: 
  860: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  861: redirect_relative_different_port() ->
  862:     [{doc, "Test that a 30X redirect with a relative target, but different "
  863:       "port, is handled correctly."}].
  864: redirect_relative_different_port(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  865:     URL301 = mixed_url(http, "/301_custom_url.html", Config),
  866:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  867:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
  868: 
  869:     % We need an extra server of the same protocol here, so spawn a new
  870:     % HTTP-protocol one
  871:     Port = server_start(sim_http, []),
  872:     {ok, Host} = inet:gethostname(),
  873:     % Prefix the URI with '/' instead of a scheme
  874:     TargetUrl = "//" ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ "/dummy.html",
  875:     Headers = [{"x-test-301-url", TargetUrl}],
  876: 
  877:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}}
  878: 	= httpc:request(get, {URL301, Headers}, [], RequestOpts, Profile),
  879: 
  880:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], []}}
  881: 	= httpc:request(head, {URL301, Headers}, [], RequestOpts, Profile),
  882: 
  883:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}}
  884: 	= httpc:request(post, {URL301, Headers, "text/plain", "foobar"},
  885: 			[], RequestOpts, Profile).
  886: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  887: cookie() ->
  888:     [{doc, "Test cookies on the default profile."}].
  889: cookie(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  890:     ok = httpc:set_options([{cookies, enabled}]),
  891: 
  892:     Request0 = {url(group_name(Config), "/cookie.html", Config), []},
  893:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  894: 
  895:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}}
  896: 	= httpc:request(get, Request0, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts),
  897: 
  898:     Request1 = {url(group_name(Config), "/", Config), []},
  899: 
  900:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}} = global:trans(
  901:         {cookies, verify},
  902:         fun() -> httpc:request(get, Request1, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts) end,
  903:         [node()],
  904:         100
  905:     ),
  906: 
  907:    [{session_cookies, [_|_]}] = httpc:which_cookies(httpc:default_profile()),
  908: 
  909:     ok = httpc:set_options([{cookies, disabled}]).
  910: 
  911: 
  912: 
  913: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  914: cookie_profile() ->
  915:     [{doc, "Test cookies on a non default profile."}].
  916: cookie_profile(Config) when is_list(Config) ->   
  917:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
  918:     ok = httpc:set_options([{cookies, enabled}], Profile),
  919: 
  920:     Request0 = {url(group_name(Config), "/cookie.html", Config), []},
  921:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  922: 
  923:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}}
  924: 	= httpc:request(get, Request0, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
  925: 
  926:     Request1 = {url(group_name(Config), "/", Config), []},
  927: 
  928:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}} = global:trans(
  929:         {cookies, verify},
  930:         fun() -> httpc:request(get, Request1, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile) end,
  931:         [node()],
  932:         100
  933:     ).
  934:

  973: 		     [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{headers_as_is, true} | RequestOpts], Profile),
  974: 
  975:     {ok, {{_,400,_}, [_|_], [_|_]}} =

  977:                       [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{headers_as_is, true} | RequestOpts], Profile).

  981: userinfo() ->
  982:     [{doc, "Test user info e.i. http://user:passwd@host:port/"}].
  983: userinfo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  984:     
  985:     URLAuth = url(group_name(Config), "alladin:sesame", "/userinfo.html", Config),
  986:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
  987:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
  988: 
  989:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], _}}
  990: 	= httpc:request(get, {URLAuth, []}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
  991: 
  992:     URLUnAuth = url(group_name(Config), "alladin:foobar", "/userinfo.html", Config),
  993: 
  994:     {ok, {{_,401, _}, [_ | _], _}} =
  995: 	httpc:request(get, {URLUnAuth, []}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile).
  996: 
  997: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------

 1009: streaming_error(doc) ->
 1010:     [{doc, "Only async requests can be streamed - Solves OTP-8056"}];
 1011: 
 1012: streaming_error(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1013:     Method      = get,
 1014:     Request     = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
 1015:     RequestOpts = [{sync, true} | proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, [])],
 1016:     Profile     = ?profile(Config),
 1017: 
 1018:     {error, streaming_error} = httpc:request(Method, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1019:                                              [{stream, {self, once}} | RequestOpts], Profile),
 1020: 
 1021:     {error, streaming_error} = httpc:request(Method, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1022:                                              [{stream, self} | RequestOpts], Profile).
 1023: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1024:

 1029:     {error, _} =
 1030: 	httpc:request(get, {"http://localhost:" ++
 1031: 				integer_to_list(?NOT_IN_USE_PORT)
 1032: 			    ++ "/", []},[?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [], ?profile(Config)).

 1094: bad_response() ->
 1095:     [{doc, "Test what happens when the server does not follow the protocol"}].
 1096: 
 1097: bad_response(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1098: 
 1099:     URL0 = url(group_name(Config), "/missing_crlf.html", Config),
 1100:     URL1 = url(group_name(Config), "/wrong_statusline.html", Config),
 1101:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1102:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1103: 
 1104:     Response = httpc:request(get, {URL0, []}, [{timeout, 400},?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1105:                              RequestOpts, Profile),
 1106:     true = is_timeout_response(Response),
 1107:     ct:log("First response: ~p~n", [Response]),
 1108:     {error, Reason} = httpc:request(get, {URL1, []}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1109:                                     RequestOpts, Profile),
 1110: 
 1111:     ct:log("Wrong Statusline: ~p~n", [Reason]).

 1120:                              RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)),
 1121:     ct:log("Timeout response: ~p~n", [Response]),
 1122:     true = is_timeout_response(Response).

 1127: internal_server_error() ->
 1128:     [{doc, "Test 50X codes"}].
 1129: internal_server_error(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1130: 
 1131:     URL500 = url(group_name(Config), "/500.html", Config),
 1132:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1133:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1134: 
 1135:     {ok, {{_,500,_}, [_ | _], _}}
 1136: 	= httpc:request(get, {URL500, []}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
 1137: 
 1138:     URL503 = url(group_name(Config), "/503.html", Config),
 1139: 
 1140:     %% Used to be able to make the service available after retry.
 1141:     ets:new(unavailable, [named_table, public, set]),
 1142:     ets:insert(unavailable, {503, unavailable}),
 1143: 
 1144:     {ok, {{_,200, _}, [_ | _], [_|_]}} =
 1145: 	httpc:request(get, {URL503, []}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
 1146: 
 1147:     ets:insert(unavailable, {503, long_unavailable}),
 1148: 
 1149:     {ok, {{_,503, _}, [_ | _], [_|_]}} =
 1150: 	httpc:request(get, {URL503, []}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
 1151: 
 1152:     ets:delete(unavailable).

 1194:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1195:

 1198:                       RequestOpts, Profile),
 1199:     inets_test_lib:check_body(Body1),
 1200:     {ok, {{"HTTP/1.1", 200, _}, [_ | _], Body2 = [_ | _]}} =
 1201: 	httpc:request(get, {URL, []}, [{version, "HTTP/1.1"}, ?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1202:                       RequestOpts, Profile),

 1217:                       RequestOpts, Profile),
 1218:

 1220:

 1226: 
 1227: headers() ->
 1228:     [{doc,"Use as many request headers as possible not used in proxy_headers"}].
 1229: headers(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1230: 
 1231:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config),
 1232:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1233:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1234:     DocRoot = proplists:get_value(doc_root, Config),
 1235: 
 1236:     {ok, FileInfo} =
 1237: 	file:read_file_info(filename:join([DocRoot,"dummy.html"])),
 1238:     CreatedSec =
 1239: 	calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds(
 1240: 	  FileInfo#file_info.mtime),
 1241: 
 1242:     Mod = httpd_util:rfc1123_date(
 1243: 	    calendar:gregorian_seconds_to_datetime(
 1244: 	      CreatedSec-1)),
 1245: 
 1246:     Date = httpd_util:rfc1123_date({date(), time()}),
 1247: 
 1248:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_ | _]}} =
 1249: 	httpc:request(get, {URL, [{"If-Modified-Since",
 1250: 				   Mod},
 1251: 				  {"From","webmaster@erlang.se"},
 1252: 				  {"Date", Date}
 1253: 				 ]}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
 1254: 
 1255:     Mod1 =  httpd_util:rfc1123_date(
 1256: 	      calendar:gregorian_seconds_to_datetime(
 1257: 		CreatedSec+1)),
 1258: 
 1259:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_ | _]}} =
 1260: 	httpc:request(get, {URL, [{"If-UnModified-Since",
 1261: 				   Mod1}
 1262: 				 ]}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
 1263: 
 1264:     Tag = httpd_util:create_etag(FileInfo),
 1265: 
 1266: 
 1267:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_ | _]}} =
 1268: 	httpc:request(get, {URL, [{"If-Match",
 1269: 				   Tag}
 1270: 				 ]}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
 1271: 
 1272:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], _}} =
 1273: 	httpc:request(get, {URL, [{"If-None-Match",
 1274: 				   "NotEtag,NeihterEtag"},
 1275: 				  {"Connection", "Close"}
 1276: 				 ]}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile).
 1277: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1278: headers_dummy() ->
 1279:     ["Test the code for handling headers we do not want/can send "
 1280:      "to a real server. Note it is not logical to send"
 1281:      "all of these headers together, we only want to test that"
 1282:      "the code for handling headers will not crash."].
 1283: 
 1284: headers_dummy(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1285: 
 1286:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/dummy_headers.html", Config),
 1287:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1288: 
 1289:     Foo = http_chunk:encode("foobar") ++
 1290: 	binary_to_list(http_chunk:encode_last()),
 1291:     FooBar =  Foo ++ "\r\n\r\nOther:inets_test\r\n\r\n",
 1292: 
 1293:     UserPasswd = base64:encode_to_string("Alladin:Sesame"),
 1294:     Auth = "Basic " ++ UserPasswd,
 1295: 
 1296:     %% The dummy server will ignore the headers, we only want to test
 1297:     %% that the client header-handling code. This would not
 1298:     %% be a valid http-request!
 1299:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], [_|_]}} =
 1300: 	httpc:request(post,
 1301: 		     {URL,
 1302: 		      [{"Via",
 1303: 			"1.0 fred, 1.1 nowhere.com (Apache/1.1)"},
 1304: 		       {"Warning","1#pseudonym foobar"},
 1305: 		       {"Vary","*"},
 1306: 		       {"Upgrade","HTTP/2.0"},
 1307: 		       {"Pragma", "1#no-cache"},
 1308: 		       {"Cache-Control", "no-cache"},
 1309: 		       {"Connection", "close"},
 1310: 		       {"Date", "Sat, 29 Oct 1994 19:43:31 GMT"},
 1311: 		       {"Accept", " text/plain; q=0.5, text/html"},
 1312: 		       {"Accept-Language", "en"},
 1313: 		       {"Accept-Encoding","chunked"},
 1314: 		       {"Accept-Charset", "ISO8859-1"},
 1315: 		       {"Authorization", Auth},
 1316: 		       {"Expect", "1#100-continue"},
 1317: 		       {"User-Agent","inets"},
 1318: 		       {"Transfer-Encoding","chunked"},
 1319: 		       {"Range", " bytes=0-499"},
 1320: 		       {"If-Range", "Sat, 29 Oct 1994 19:43:31 GMT"},
 1321: 		       {"If-Match", "*"},
 1322: 		       {"Content-Type", "text/plain"},
 1323: 		       {"Content-Length", "6"},
 1324: 		       {"Content-Language", "en"},
 1325: 		       {"Content-Location", "http://www.foobar.se"},
 1326: 		       {"Content-MD5",
 1327: 			"104528739076276072743283077410617235478"},
 1328: 		       {"Content-Range", "bytes 0-499/1234"},
 1329: 		       {"Allow", "GET"},
 1330: 		       {"Proxy-Authorization", Auth},
 1331: 		       {"Expires", "Sat, 29 Oct 1994 19:43:31 GMT"},
 1332: 		       {"Upgrade", "HTTP/2.0"},
 1333: 		       {"Last-Modified", "Sat, 29 Oct 1994 19:43:31 GMT"},
 1334: 		       {"Trailer","1#User-Agent"}
 1335: 		      ], "text/plain", FooBar},
 1336: 		     [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)).
 1337: 
 1338:

 1345:                                                       RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)),
 1346:     "a b" = proplists:get_value("folded", Headers).

 1350: headers_conflict_chunked_with_length() ->
 1351:     [{doc, "Test the code for handling headers with both Transfer-Encoding"
 1352:      "and Content-Length which must receive error in default (not relaxed) mode"
 1353:      "and must receive successful response in relaxed mode"}].
 1354: headers_conflict_chunked_with_length(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1355:     Request = {url(group_name(Config), "/headers_conflict_chunked_with_length.html", Config), []},
 1356:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1357:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1358:     {error, {could_not_parse_as_http, _}} = httpc:request(get, Request,
 1359:                                                           [{relaxed, false},?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1360:                                                           RequestOpts, Profile),
 1361:     {ok,{{_,200,_},_,_}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [{relaxed, true}, ?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1362:                                          RequestOpts, Profile),
 1363:     ok.
 1364: 
 1365: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1366: invalid_headers() ->
 1367:     [{doc, "Test invalid header format"}].
 1368: invalid_headers(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1369:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config),
 1370:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1371:     {error,{invalid_header,{"headers",
 1372:                             [{"user-agent","httpc"}]}}}	=
 1373:         httpc:request(get, {URL, [{"headers", [{"user-agent", "httpc"}]}]},
 1374:                                   [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)).
 1375: 
 1376: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1377: invalid_headers_key(Config) ->
 1378:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config),
 1379:                 [{cookie, "valid cookie"}]},
 1380:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1381:     {error, {headers_error, invalid_field}} =
 1382:         httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)).
 1383: 
 1384: invalid_headers_value(Config) ->
 1385:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config),
 1386:                 [{"cookie", atom_value}]},
 1387:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1388:     {error, {headers_error, invalid_value}} =
 1389:         httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)).
 1390: 
 1391: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1392: 
 1393: %% Doc not generated, but we can live without that.  It should be
 1394: %%  [{doc, "Header type test"}].
 1395: -define(HDR_TYPE_TEST(Name, Method, Value),
 1396:         Name(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1397:             test_header_type(Config, Method, Value)).
 1398: 
 1399: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_0, get, "stringheader").
 1400: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_1, get, <<"binary">>).
 1401: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_2, get, ["an", <<"iolist">>]).
 1402: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_3, head, "stringheader").
 1403: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_4, head, <<"binary">>).
 1404: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_5, head, ["an", <<"iolist">>]).
 1405: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_6, post, "stringheader").
 1406: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_7, post, <<"binary">>).
 1407: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_8, post, ["an", <<"iolist">>]).
 1408: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_9, put, "stringheader").
 1409: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_10, put, <<"binary">>).
 1410: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_11, put, ["an", <<"iolist">>]).
 1411: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_12, delete, "stringheader").
 1412: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_13, delete, <<"binary">>).
 1413: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_14, delete, ["an", <<"iolist">>]).
 1414: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_15, trace, "stringheader").
 1415: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_16, trace, <<"binary">>).
 1416: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_17, trace, ["an", <<"iolist">>]).
 1417: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_18, patch, "stringheader").
 1418: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_19, patch, <<"binary">>).
 1419: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_20, patch, ["an", <<"iolist">>]).
 1420: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_21, options, "stringheader").
 1421: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_22, options, <<"binary">>).
 1422: ?HDR_TYPE_TEST(header_type_23, options, ["an", <<"iolist">>]).
 1423: 
 1424: test_header_type(Config, Method, Value) ->
 1425:     {Method, Value, {ok, _Data}} =
 1426:         {Method, Value,
 1427:          httpc:request(Method,
 1428:                       make_request(Config, Method, Value),
 1429:                       [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1430:                       [], ?profile(Config))}.
 1431: 
 1432: make_request(Config, Method, Value) ->
 1433:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config),
 1434:     Headers = [{"other-header", Value},
 1435:                {"user-agent", Value}],
 1436:     %% Generate request with or without body, depending on method.
 1437:     case method_type(Method) of
 1438:         read ->
 1439:             {URL, Headers};
 1440:         write ->
 1441:             {URL, Headers, "text/plain", ""}
 1442:     end.
 1443: 
 1444: method_type(Method) ->
 1445:     case Method of
 1446:         get -> read;
 1447:         head -> read;
 1448:         options -> read;
 1449:         trace -> read;
 1450:         post -> write;
 1451:         put -> write;
 1452:         delete -> write;
 1453:         patch -> write
 1454:     end.
 1455: 
 1456: is_timeout_response({error, timeout}) -> true;
 1457: is_timeout_response({error, {failed_connect, [{to_address, {_Host, _Port}},
 1458:                                               {Proto, [Proto], timeout}]}}) -> true;
 1459: is_timeout_response(_Response) -> false.
 1460: 
 1461: 
 1462: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1463: 
 1464: invalid_body(Config) ->
 1465:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config),
 1466:     {error, invalid_request} =
 1467:         httpc:request(post, {URL, [], <<"text/plain">>, "foobar"},
 1468:                       [], []).
 1469: 
 1470: invalid_body_fun(Config) ->
 1471:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config),
 1472:     BodyFun = fun() -> body_part end,
 1473:     {error, {bad_body_generator, _}} =
 1474:         httpc:request(post, {URL, [], "text/plain", {BodyFun, init}},
 1475:                       [], []).
 1476: 
 1477: 
 1478: invalid_method(Config) ->
 1479:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config),
 1480:     {error, invalid_method} =
 1481:         httpc:request(past, {URL, [], <<"text/plain">>, "foobar"},
 1482:                       [], []).
 1483: 
 1484: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1485: 
 1486: binary_url(Config) ->
 1487:     URL = uri_string:normalize(url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config)),
 1488:     case group_name(Config) of
 1489:         https -> ok;
 1490:         _ -> {ok, _Response} = httpc:request(unicode:characters_to_binary(URL), ?profile(Config))
 1491:     end.
 1492: 
 1493: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1494: 
 1495: iolist_body(Config) ->
 1496:     {ok, ListenSocket} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active,once}, binary]),
 1497:     {ok,{_,Port}} = inet:sockname(ListenSocket),
 1498: 
 1499:     ProcessHeaders = 
 1500:         fun 
 1501:             F([], Acc) ->
 1502:                 Acc;
 1503:             F([Line|Tail], Acc0) ->
 1504:                 Acc1 = 
 1505:                     case binary:split(Line, <<": ">>, [trim_all]) of
 1506:                         [Key, Value] ->
 1507:                             Acc0#{Key => Value};
 1508:                         _ ->
 1509:                             Acc0
 1510:                     end,
 1511:                 F(Tail, Acc1)
 1512:         end,
 1513:     
 1514:     proc_lib:spawn(fun() ->
 1515:         {ok, Accept} = gen_tcp:accept(ListenSocket),
 1516:         receive
 1517:             {tcp, Accept, Msg} ->
 1518:                 ct:log("Message received: ~p", [Msg]),
 1519:                 [_HeadLine | HeaderLines] = binary:split(Msg, <<"\r\n">>, [global]),
 1520:                 Headers = ProcessHeaders(HeaderLines, #{}),
 1521:                 ContentLength = maps:get(<<"content-length">>, Headers, "-1"),
 1522:                 gen_tcp:send(Accept, [
 1523:                     "HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\n",
 1524:                     "\r\n",
 1525:                     ContentLength
 1526:                 ])
 1527:         after
 1528:             1000 ->
 1529:                 ct:fail("Timeout: did not receive packet")
 1530:         end
 1531:     end),
 1532: 
 1533:     {ok, Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1534:     URL = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port),
 1535:     ReqBody = [
 1536:         <<"abc">>,
 1537:         <<"def">>
 1538:     ],
 1539:     {ok, Resp} = httpc:request(post, {URL, _Headers = [], _ContentType = "text/plain", ReqBody},
 1540:                                [], [], ?profile(Config)),
 1541:     ct:log("Got response ~p", [Resp]),
 1542:     case Resp of
 1543:         {{"HTTP/1.1", 200, "OK"}, [], RespBody} ->
 1544:             ReqBody_ContentLength = list_to_integer([C || C <- RespBody, C =/= $\s]),
 1545:             ?assertEqual(iolist_size(ReqBody), ReqBody_ContentLength);
 1546:         _ ->
 1547:             ct:fail("Didn't receive the correct response")
 1548:     end.
 1549: 
 1550: 
 1551: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1552: 
 1553: no_scheme(_Config) ->
 1554:     {error,{bad_scheme,"ftp"}} = httpc:request("ftp://foobar"),
 1555:     {error,{no_scheme}} = httpc:request("//foobar"),
 1556:     {error,{no_scheme}} = httpc:request("foobar"),
 1557:     ok.
 1558: 
 1559: 
 1560: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1561: 
 1562: invalid_uri(Config) ->
 1563:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/bar?x[]=a", Config),
 1564:     {error, invalid_uri} = httpc:request(URL),
 1565:     ok.
 1566: 
 1567: 
 1568: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1569: remote_socket_close(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1570:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/just_close.html", Config),
 1571:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1572:     {error, socket_closed_remotely} = httpc:request(get, {URL, []}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1573:                                                     RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)).
 1574: 
 1575: 
 1576: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1577: 
 1578: remote_socket_close_async(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1579:     Request = {url(group_name(Config), "/just_close.html", Config), []},
 1580:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1581:     Options     = [{sync, false} | RequestOpts],
 1582:     {ok, RequestId} =
 1583: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], Options, ?profile(Config)),
 1584:     receive
 1585: 	{http, {RequestId, {error, socket_closed_remotely}}} ->
 1586: 	    ok
 1587:     end.
 1588: 
 1589: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1590: 
 1591: process_leak_on_keepalive(Config) ->
 1592:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
 1593:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1594:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1595:     HttpcHandlers0 = supervisor:which_children(httpc_handler_sup),
 1596:     {ok, {{_, 200, _}, _, Body}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [], RequestOpts, Profile),
 1597:     HttpcHandlers1 = supervisor:which_children(httpc_handler_sup),
 1598:     ChildrenCount = supervisor:count_children(httpc_handler_sup),
 1599:     %% Assuming that the new handler will be selected for keep_alive
 1600:     %% which could not be the case if other handlers existed
 1601:     [{undefined, Pid, worker, [httpc_handler]}] =
 1602:         ordsets:to_list(
 1603:           ordsets:subtract(ordsets:from_list(HttpcHandlers1),
 1604:                            ordsets:from_list(HttpcHandlers0))),
 1605:     State = sys:get_state(Pid),
 1606:     #session{socket=Socket} = element(3, State),
 1607:     gen_tcp:close(Socket),
 1608: 
 1609:     {ok, {{_, 200, _}, _, Body}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [], RequestOpts, Profile),
 1610:     %% bad handler with the closed socket should get replaced by
 1611:     %% the new one, so children count should stay the same
 1612:     ChildrenCount = supervisor:count_children(httpc_handler_sup),
 1613:     ok.
 1614: 
 1615: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1616: 
 1617: stream_to_pid(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1618:     ReceiverPid = create_receiver(pid),
 1619:     Receiver    = ReceiverPid,
 1620: 
 1621:     stream(ReceiverPid, Receiver, Config),
 1622: 
 1623:     stop_receiver(ReceiverPid).
 1624: 
 1625: stream_through_fun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1626:     ReceiverPid = create_receiver(function),
 1627:     Receiver = stream_deliver_fun(ReceiverPid),
 1628: 
 1629:     stream(ReceiverPid, Receiver, Config),
 1630: 
 1631:     stop_receiver(ReceiverPid).
 1632: 
 1633: stream_through_mfa(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1634:     ReceiverPid = create_receiver(mfa),
 1635:     Receiver    = {?MODULE, stream_deliver, [mfa, ReceiverPid]},
 1636: 
 1637:     stream(ReceiverPid, Receiver, Config).
 1638: 
 1639: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1640: 
 1641: inet_opts(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1642:     MaxSessions      = 5,
 1643:     MaxKeepAlive     = 10,
 1644:     KeepAliveTimeout = timer:minutes(2),
 1645:     ConnOptions = [{max_sessions,          MaxSessions},
 1646: 		   {max_keep_alive_length, MaxKeepAlive},
 1647: 		   {keep_alive_timeout,    KeepAliveTimeout}],
 1648:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1649:     ok = httpc:set_options(ConnOptions, Profile),
 1650: 
 1651:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
 1652:     Timeout      = timer:seconds(5),
 1653:     ConnTimeout  = Timeout + timer:seconds(5),
 1654:     HttpOptions = [{timeout, Timeout}, {connect_timeout, ConnTimeout}, ?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1655:     Options0     = [{socket_opts, [{tos,    87},
 1656: 				   {recbuf, 16#FFFF},
 1657: 				   {sndbuf, 16#FFFF}]}],
 1658: 
 1659:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], ReplyBody0 = [_ | _]}} = httpc:request(get, Request, HttpOptions,
 1660:                                                                      Options0, Profile),
 1661:     inets_test_lib:check_body(ReplyBody0),
 1662: 
 1663:     Options1 = [{socket_opts, [{tos,    84},
 1664: 			       {recbuf, 32#1FFFF},
 1665: 			       {sndbuf, 32#1FFFF}]}],
 1666:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], ReplyBody1 = [_ | _]}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1667:                                                                      Options1, Profile),
 1668:     inets_test_lib:check_body(ReplyBody1).
 1669: 
 1670: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------

 1674:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1675:     {ok, {{_, 200, _}, _, Body}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1676:                                                  RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)),
 1677:     inets_test_lib:check_body(Body).
