 1688: multipart_chunks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1689:     Request = {url(group_name(Config), "/multipart_chunks.html", Config), []},
 1690:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1691:     {ok, Ref} = httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 1692:                               [{sync, false}, {stream, self} | RequestOpts], ?profile(Config)),
 1693:     ok = receive_stream_n(Ref, 10),
 1694:     httpc:cancel_request(Ref).
 1695:     
 1696: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1697: timeout_memory_leak() ->
 1698:     [{doc, "Check OTP-8739"}].
 1699: timeout_memory_leak(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1700:     {_DummyServerPid, Port} = otp_8739_dummy_server(),
 1701:     {ok, Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1702:     Request = {?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ "/dummy.html", []},
 1703:     Profile = ?config(profile, Config),
 1704:     case httpc:request(get, Request, [{connect_timeout, 500}, {timeout, 1}], [{sync, true}], Profile) of
 1705: 	{error, timeout} ->
 1706: 	    %% And now we check the size of the handler db
 1707: 	    Info = httpc:info(Profile),
 1708: 	    ct:log("Info: ~p", [Info]),
 1709: 	    {value, {handlers, Handlers}} =
 1710: 		lists:keysearch(handlers, 1, Info),
 1711: 	    case Handlers of
 1712: 		[] ->
 1713: 		    ok;
 1714: 		_ ->
 1715: 		    ct:fail({unexpected_handlers, Handlers})
 1716: 	    end;
 1717: 	Unexpected ->
 1718: 	    ct:fail({unexpected, Unexpected})
 1719:     end.
 1720: 
 1721: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1722: 
 1723: wait_for_whole_response() ->
 1724:     [{doc, "Check OTP-8154"}, {timetrap, timer:minutes(3)}].
 1725: wait_for_whole_response(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1726: 
 1727:      ReqSeqNumServer = start_sequence_number_server(),
 1728:      RespSeqNumServer = start_sequence_number_server(),
 1729:      {ok, Server, Port} = start_slow_server(RespSeqNumServer),
 1730:      Clients = run_clients(105, Port, ReqSeqNumServer),
 1731:      ok = wait4clients(Clients, timer:minutes(3)),
 1732:      Server ! shutdown,
 1733:      RespSeqNumServer ! shutdown,
 1734:      ReqSeqNumServer ! shutdown.
 1735: 
 1736: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1737: post_204_chunked() ->
 1738:     [{doc,"Test that chunked encoded 204 responses do not freeze the http client"}].
 1739: post_204_chunked(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1740:     Msg = "HTTP/1.1 204 No Content\r\n" ++
 1741:         "Date: Thu, 23 Aug 2018 13:36:29 GMT\r\n" ++
 1742:         "Content-Type: text/html\r\n" ++
 1743:         "Server: inets/6.5.2.3\r\n" ++
 1744:         "Cache-Control: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1745:         "Pragma: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1746:         "Expires: Fri, 24 Aug 2018 07:49:35 GMT\r\n" ++
 1747:         "Transfer-Encoding: chunked\r\n" ++
 1748:         "\r\n",
 1749:     Chunk = "0\r\n\r\n",
 1750: 
 1751:     {ok, ListenSocket} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active,once}, binary]),
 1752:     {ok,{_,Port}} = inet:sockname(ListenSocket),
 1753:     spawn(fun () -> custom_server(Msg, Chunk, ListenSocket,
 1754:                                   fun custom_receive/0) end),
 1755: 
 1756:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1757:     End = "/cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:post_204",
 1758:     URL = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End,
 1759:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1760:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(post, {URL, [], "text/html", []}, [], [], Profile),
 1761:     timer:sleep(500),
 1762:     %% Second request times out in the faulty case.
 1763:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(post, {URL, [], "text/html", []}, [], [], Profile).
 1764: 
 1765: custom_receive() ->
 1766:     receive
 1767:         {tcp, _, Msg} ->
 1768:             ct:log("Message received: ~p", [Msg])
 1769:     after
 1770:         1000 ->
 1771:             ct:fail("Timeout: did not receive packet")
 1772:     end.
 1773: 
 1774: %% Custom server is used to test special cases when using chunked encoding
 1775: custom_server(Msg, Chunk, ListenSocket, ReceiveFun) ->
 1776:     {ok, Accept} = gen_tcp:accept(ListenSocket),
 1777:     ReceiveFun(),
 1778:     send_response(Msg, Chunk, Accept),
 1779:     custom_server_loop(Msg, Chunk, Accept, ReceiveFun).
 1780: 
 1781: custom_server_loop(Msg, Chunk, Accept, ReceiveFun) ->
 1782:     ReceiveFun(),
 1783:     send_response(Msg, Chunk, Accept),
 1784:     custom_server_loop(Msg, Chunk, Accept, ReceiveFun).
 1785: 
 1786: send_response(Msg, Chunk, Socket) ->
 1787:     inet:setopts(Socket, [{active, once}]),
 1788:     gen_tcp:send(Socket, Msg),
 1789:     timer:sleep(250),
 1790:     gen_tcp:send(Socket, Chunk).
 1791: 
 1792: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1793: head_chunked_empty_body() ->
 1794:     [{doc,"Test that HTTP responses (to HEAD requests) with 'Transfer-Encoding: chunked' and empty chunked-encoded body do not freeze the http client"}].
 1795: head_chunked_empty_body(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1796:     Msg = "HTTP/1.1 403 Forbidden\r\n" ++
 1797:         "Date: Thu, 23 Aug 2018 13:36:29 GMT\r\n" ++
 1798:         "Content-Type: text/html\r\n" ++
 1799:         "Server: inets/6.5.2.3\r\n" ++
 1800:         "Cache-Control: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1801:         "Pragma: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1802:         "Expires: Fri, 24 Aug 2018 07:49:35 GMT\r\n" ++
 1803:         "Transfer-Encoding: chunked\r\n" ++
 1804:         "\r\n",
 1805:     Chunk = "0\r\n\r\n",
 1806: 
 1807:     {ok, ListenSocket} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active,once}, binary]),
 1808:     {ok,{_,Port}} = inet:sockname(ListenSocket),
 1809:     spawn(fun () -> custom_server(Msg, Chunk, ListenSocket,
 1810:                                   fun custom_receive/0) end),
 1811:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1812:     URL = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port),
 1813:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1814:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(head, {URL, []}, [], [], Profile),
 1815:     timer:sleep(500),
 1816:     %% Second request times out in the faulty case.
 1817:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(head, {URL, []}, [], [], Profile).
 1818: 
 1819: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1820: head_empty_body() ->
 1821:     [{doc,"Test that HTTP responses (to HEAD requests) with 'Transfer-Encoding: chunked' and empty body do not freeze the http client"}].
 1822: head_empty_body(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1823:     Msg = "HTTP/1.1 403 Forbidden\r\n" ++
 1824:         "Date: Thu, 23 Aug 2018 13:36:29 GMT\r\n" ++
 1825:         "Content-Type: text/html\r\n" ++
 1826:         "Server: inets/6.5.2.3\r\n" ++
 1827:         "Cache-Control: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1828:         "Pragma: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1829:         "Expires: Fri, 24 Aug 2018 07:49:35 GMT\r\n" ++
 1830:         "Transfer-Encoding: chunked\r\n" ++
 1831:         "\r\n",
 1832:     NoChunk = "", %% Do not chunk encode!
 1833: 
 1834:     {ok, ListenSocket} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active,once}, binary]),
 1835:     {ok,{_,Port}} = inet:sockname(ListenSocket),
 1836:     spawn(fun () -> custom_server(Msg, NoChunk, ListenSocket,
 1837:                                   fun custom_receive/0) end),
 1838:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1839:     URL = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port),
 1840:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1841:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(head, {URL, []}, [], [], Profile),
 1842:     timer:sleep(500),
 1843:     %% Second request times out in the faulty case.
 1844:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(head, {URL, []}, [], [], Profile).
 1845: 
 1846: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1847: chunkify_fun() ->
 1848:     [{doc,"Test that a chunked encoded request does not include the 'Content-Length header'"}].
 1849: chunkify_fun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1850:     Msg = "HTTP/1.1 204 No Content\r\n" ++
 1851:         "Date: Thu, 23 Aug 2018 13:36:29 GMT\r\n" ++
 1852:         "Content-Type: text/html\r\n" ++
 1853:         "Server: inets/6.5.2.3\r\n" ++
 1854:         "Cache-Control: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1855:         "Pragma: no-cache\r\n" ++
 1856:         "Expires: Fri, 24 Aug 2018 07:49:35 GMT\r\n" ++
 1857:         "Transfer-Encoding: chunked\r\n" ++
 1858:         "\r\n",
 1859:     Chunk = "0\r\n\r\n",
 1860: 
 1861:     {ok, ListenSocket} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active,once}, binary]),
 1862:     {ok,{_,Port}} = inet:sockname(ListenSocket),
 1863:     spawn(fun () -> custom_server(Msg, Chunk, ListenSocket,
 1864:                                   fun chunkify_receive/0) end),
 1865: 
 1866:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1867:     End = "/cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example",
 1868:     URL = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End,
 1869:     Fun = fun(_) -> {ok,<<1>>,eof_body} end,
 1870:     Acc = start,
 1871: 
 1872:     {ok, {{_,204,_}, _, _}} =
 1873:         httpc:request(put, {URL, [], "text/html", {chunkify, Fun, Acc}},
 1874:                       [], [], ?profile(Config)).
 1875: 
 1876: chunkify_receive() ->
 1877:     Error = "HTTP/1.1 500 Internal Server Error\r\n" ++
 1878:         "Content-Length: 0\r\n\r\n",
 1879:     receive
 1880:         {tcp, Port, Msg} ->
 1881:             case binary:match(Msg, <<"content-length">>) of
 1882:                 nomatch ->
 1883:                     ct:log("Message received: ~s", [binary_to_list(Msg)]);
 1884:                 {_, _} ->
 1885:                     ct:log("Message received (negative): ~s", [binary_to_list(Msg)]),
 1886:                     %% Signal a testcase failure when the received HTTP request
 1887:                     %% contains a 'Content-Length' header.
 1888:                     gen_tcp:send(Port, Error),
 1889:                     ct:fail("Content-Length present in received headers.")
 1890:             end
 1891:     after
 1892:         1000 ->
 1893:             ct:fail("Timeout: did not receive packet")
 1894:     end.
 1895: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1896: stream_fun_server_close() ->
 1897:     [{doc, "Test that an error msg is received when using a receiver fun as stream target"}].
 1898: stream_fun_server_close(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1899:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/delay_close.html", Config), []},
 1900:     Self = self(),
 1901:     Fun = fun(X) -> Self ! X end,
 1902:     % Use the default proflie here as process_leak_on_keepalive depends on this case
 1903:     {ok, RequestId} = httpc:request(get, Request, [],
 1904:                                     [{sync, false}, {receiver, Fun}], ?profile(Config)),
 1905:     receive
 1906:         {RequestId, {error, Reason}} ->
 1907:             ct:log("Close ~p", [Reason]),
 1908:             ok
 1909:     after 13000 ->
 1910:             ct:fail(did_not_receive_close)
 1911:     end. 
 1912: 
 1913: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1914: server_closing_connection_on_first_response() ->
 1915:     [{doc, "Client receives \"Connection: close\" on first response."
 1916:       "A client that receives a \"close\" connection option MUST cease sending"
 1917:       "requests on that connection and close the connection after reading"
 1918:       "the response message containing the \"close\""}].
 1919: server_closing_connection_on_first_response(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1920:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1921:     ReqSrvSendOctFun =
 1922:         fun(V, U, S) ->
 1923:                 {ok, {{V, S, _}, Headers0, []}} =
 1924:                     httpc:request(get, {U, []}, [{version, V}], RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)),
 1925:                 {_, SendOctStr} =
 1926:                     proplists:lookup("x-socket-stat-send-oct", Headers0),
 1927:                 list_to_integer(SendOctStr)
 1928:         end,
 1929:     V = "HTTP/1.1",
 1930:     Url0 = url(group_name(Config), "/http_1_1_send_oct.html", Config),
 1931:     Url1 = url(group_name(Config), "/http_1_1_send_oct_and_connection_close.html", Config),
 1932:     %% Test case assumes at most one reusable past session.
 1933:     _ = ReqSrvSendOctFun(V, Url1, 204),
 1934:     0 = ReqSrvSendOctFun(V, Url0, 204),
 1935:     ok.
 1936: 
 1937: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1938: server_closing_connection_on_second_response() ->
 1939:     [{doc, "Client receives \"Connection: close\" on second response."
 1940:       "A client that receives a \"close\" connection option MUST cease sending"
 1941:       "requests on that connection and close the connection after reading"
 1942:       "the response message containing the \"close\""}].
 1943: server_closing_connection_on_second_response(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1944:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 1945:     ReqSrvSendOctFun =
 1946:         fun(V, U, S) ->
 1947:                 {ok, {{V, S, _}, Headers0, []}} =
 1948:                     httpc:request(get, {U, []}, [{version, V}], RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)),
 1949:                 {_, SendOctStr} =
 1950:                     proplists:lookup("x-socket-stat-send-oct", Headers0),
 1951:                 list_to_integer(SendOctStr)
 1952:         end,
 1953:     V = "HTTP/1.1",
 1954:     Url0 = url(group_name(Config), "/http_1_1_send_oct.html", Config),
 1955:     Url1 = url(group_name(Config), "/http_1_1_send_oct_and_connection_close.html", Config),
 1956:     %% Test case assumes no reusable past sessions.
 1957:     SendOct0 = 0 = ReqSrvSendOctFun(V, Url0, 204),
 1958:     case ReqSrvSendOctFun(V, Url1, 204) of SendOct1 when SendOct1 > SendOct0 -> ok end,
 1959:     0 = ReqSrvSendOctFun(V, Url0, 204),
 1960:     ok.
 1961: 
 1962: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1963: slow_connection() ->
 1964:     [{doc, "Test that a request on a slow keep-alive connection won't crash the httpc_manager"}].
 1965: slow_connection(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1966:     BodyFun = fun(0) -> eof;
 1967:                  (LenLeft) -> timer:sleep(1000),
 1968:                               {ok, lists:duplicate(10, "1"), LenLeft - 10}
 1969:               end,
 1970:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/httpc_SUITE:esi_post", Config),
 1971:                 [{"content-length", "100"}],
 1972:                 "text/plain",
 1973:                 {BodyFun, 100}},
 1974:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1975:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(post, Request, [], [], Profile),
 1976:     %% Second request causes a crash if gen_server timeout is not set to infinity
 1977:     %% in httpc_handler.
 1978:     {ok, _} = httpc:request(post, Request, [], [], Profile).
 1979: 
 1980: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1981: unix_domain_socket() ->
 1982:     [{doc, "Test HTTP requests over unix domain sockets"}].
 1983: unix_domain_socket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1984: 
 1985:     URL = "http:///v1/kv/foo",
 1986:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 1987: 
 1988:     ct:log("Using profile ~w", [Profile]),
 1989:     {ok,[{unix_socket,?UNIX_SOCKET}]} =
 1990:         httpc:get_options([unix_socket], Profile),
 1991:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], _}}
 1992: 	= httpc:request(put, {URL, [], [], ""}, [], [], Profile),
 1993:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], _}}
 1994:         = httpc:request(get, {URL, []}, [], [], Profile).
 1995: 
 1996: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1997: delete_no_body() ->
 1998:     [{doc, "Test that a DELETE request without Body does not send a Content-Type header - Solves ERL-536"}].
 1999: delete_no_body(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2000:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/delete_no_body.html", Config),
 2001:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 2002:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 2003:     %% Simulated server replies 500 if 'Content-Type' header is present
 2004:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, _, _}} =
 2005:         httpc:request(delete, {URL, []}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
 2006:     {ok, {{_,500,_}, _, _}} =
 2007:         httpc:request(delete, {URL, [], "text/plain", "TEST"}, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 2008:                       RequestOpts, Profile).
 2009: 
 2010: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2011: post_with_content_type(doc) ->
 2012:     ["Test that a POST request with explicit 'Content-Type' does not drop the 'Content-Type' header - Solves ERL-736"];
 2013: post_with_content_type(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2014:     URL = url(group_name(Config), "/delete_no_body.html", Config),
 2015:     RequestOpts = proplists:get_value(request_opts, Config, []),
 2016:     %% Simulated server replies 500 if 'Content-Type' header is present
 2017:     {ok, {{_,500,_}, _, _}} =
 2018:         httpc:request(post, {URL, [], "application/x-www-form-urlencoded", ""},
 2019:                       [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, ?profile(Config)).
 2020: 
 2021: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2022: request_options() ->
 2023:     [{require, ipv6_hosts},
 2024:      {doc, "Test http get request with socket options against local server (IPv6)"}].
 2025: request_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2026:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
 2027:     Profile = ?profile(Config),
 2028:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], _ = [_ | _]}} = httpc:request(get, Request, [],
 2029:                                                             [{socket_opts,[{ipfamily, inet6}]}],
 2030:                                                             Profile),
 2031:     {error,{failed_connect,_ }} = httpc:request(get, Request, [], [], Profile).
 2032: 
 2033: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2034: def_ssl_opt(_Config) ->
 2035:     CaCerts = public_key:cacerts_get(),
 2036:     Ver = {verify, verify_peer},
 2037:     Certs = {cacerts, CaCerts},
 2038:     [Ver, Certs] = httpc:ssl_verify_host_options(false),
 2039:     [Ver, Certs | WildCard] = httpc:ssl_verify_host_options(true),
 2040:     [{customize_hostname_check, [{match_fun, _}]}] = WildCard,
 2041:     {'EXIT', _} = catch httpc:ssl_verify_host_options(other),
 2042:     ok.
 2043: 
 2044: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2045: remote_socket_close_parallel() ->
 2046:     [{doc,
 2047:       "Verify remote socket closure (related tickets: OTP-18509, OTP-18545,"
 2048:       "ERIERL-937). Transferred data size needs to be significant, so that "
 2049:       "socket is closed, in the middle of a transfer."
 2050:       "Note: test case is require good network and CPU - due to that "
 2051:       " it is not included in all()."}, {timetrap, timer:minutes(3)}].
 2052: remote_socket_close_parallel(Config0) when is_list(Config0) ->
 2053:     ClientNumber = 200,
 2054:     Config = [{iterations, 10} | Config0],
 2055:     ClientPids =
 2056:         [spawn(?MODULE, connect, [self(), [{client_id, Id} | Config]]) ||
 2057:             Id <- lists:seq(1, ClientNumber)],
 2058:     ct:log("Started ~p clients: ~w", [ClientNumber, ClientPids]),
 2059:     Receive = fun(S) ->
 2060:                       receive
 2061:                           ok ->
 2062:                               ct:log("++ Client finished (~p)", [S]),
 2063:                               ok;
 2064:                           Other ->
 2065:                               ct:fail(Other)
 2066:                       end
 2067:               end,
 2068:     [ok = Receive(S) || S <- lists:seq(1, ClientNumber)],
 2069:     ok.
 2070: 
 2071: connect(From, Config) ->
 2072:     From ! loop(?config(iterations, Config),
 2073:                 io_lib:format("C~p|", [?config(client_id, Config)]),
 2074:                 Config).
 2075: 
 2076: loop(0, Acc, _Config) ->
 2077:     ct:log("~n~s|", [Acc]),
 2078:     ok;
 2079: loop(Cnt, Acc, Config) ->
 2080:     case request(Config) of
 2081:         {ok, {{_,200,"OK"}, _, _}} ->
 2082:             case process_info(self(), message_queue_len) of
 2083:                 {message_queue_len,0} ->
 2084:                     loop(Cnt-1, Acc ++ ".", Config);
 2085:                 _ ->
 2086:                     %% queue is expected to be empty
 2087:                     queue_check(),
 2088:                     ct:log("~n~s|", [Acc ++ "x"]),
 2089:                     fail
 2090:             end;
 2091:         {ok, NotOk} ->
 2092:             ct:log("200 OK was not received~n~p", [NotOk]),
 2093:             fail;
 2094:         Error ->
 2095:             ct:log("Error: ~p",[Error]),
 2096:             fail
 2097:     end.
 2098: 
 2099: queue_check() ->
 2100:     receive
 2101:         {http, {ReqId, {_Result, _Head, Data}}} when is_binary(Data) ->
 2102:             ct:log("Unexpected data received: ~p ",
 2103:                       [ReqId]),
 2104:             queue_check();
 2105:         X ->
 2106:             ct:log("Caught unexpected something else: ~p",[X]),
 2107:             queue_check()
 2108:     after 5000 ->
 2109:             done
 2110:     end.
 2111: 
 2112: request(Config) ->
 2113:     Request = {url(group_name(Config), "/httpc_SUITE/foo", Config), []},
 2114:     httpc:request(get, Request, [],[{sync,true}, {body_format,binary}], ?profile(Config)).
 2115: 
 2116: foo(SID, _Env, _Input) ->
 2117:     EightyMillionBits = 80000000, %% ~10MB transferred
 2118:     mod_esi:deliver(SID, [<<0:EightyMillionBits>>]).
 2119: 
 2120: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2121: %% Internal Functions ------------------------------------------------
 2122: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2123: stream(ReceiverPid, Receiver, Config) ->
 2124:     Request  = {url(group_name(Config), "/dummy.html", Config), []},
 2125:     Options     = [{sync, false}, {receiver, Receiver}],
 2126:     {ok, RequestId} =
 2127: 	 httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], Options, ?profile(Config)),
 2128:      Body =
 2129: 	 receive
 2130: 	     {reply, ReceiverPid, {RequestId, {{_, 200, _}, _, B}}} ->
 2131: 		 B;
 2132: 	     {reply, ReceiverPid, Msg} ->
 2133: 		 ct:fail(Msg);
 2134: 	     {bad_reply, ReceiverPid, Msg} ->
 2135: 		 ct:fail(Msg)
 2136: 	 end,
 2137: 
 2138:      inets_test_lib:check_body(binary_to_list(Body)).
 2139: 
 2140: create_receiver(Type) ->
 2141:     Parent = self(),
 2142:     Receiver = fun() -> receiver(Type, Parent) end,
 2143:     spawn_link(Receiver).
 2144: 
 2145: stop_receiver(Pid) ->
 2146:     Pid ! {stop, self()}.
 2147: 
 2148: receiver(Type, Parent) ->
 2149:     receive
 2150: 	{stop, Parent} ->
 2151: 	    ok;
 2152: 	{http, ReplyInfo} when (Type =:= pid) ->
 2153: 	    Parent ! {reply, self(), ReplyInfo},
 2154: 	    receiver(Type, Parent);
 2155: 
 2156: 	{Type, ReplyInfo} ->
 2157: 	    Parent ! {reply, self(), ReplyInfo},
 2158: 	    receiver(Type, Parent);
 2159: 
 2160: 	Crap ->
 2161: 	    Parent ! {reply, self(), {bad_reply, Crap}},
 2162: 	    receiver(Type, Parent)
 2163:     end.
 2164: 
 2165: stream_deliver_fun(ReceiverPid) ->
 2166:     fun(ReplyInfo) -> stream_deliver(ReplyInfo, function, ReceiverPid) end.
 2167: 
 2168: stream_deliver(ReplyInfo, Type, ReceiverPid) ->
 2169:     ReceiverPid ! {Type, ReplyInfo},
 2170:     ok.
 2171: 
 2172: stream_test(Request, To, RequestOpts, Profile) ->
 2173:     {ok, {{_,200,_}, [_ | _], Body}} =
 2174: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], RequestOpts, Profile),
 2175:     {ok, RequestId} =
 2176: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}, To | RequestOpts], Profile),
 2177: 
 2178:     StreamedBody =
 2179: 	receive
 2180: 	    {http, {RequestId, stream_start, _Headers}} ->
 2181: 		receive_streamed_body(RequestId, <<>>);
 2182: 	    {http, {RequestId, stream_start, _Headers, Pid}}  ->
 2183: 		receive_streamed_body(RequestId, <<>>, Pid);
 2184: 	    {http, Msg} ->
 2185: 		ct:fail(Msg)
 2186: 	end,
 2187: 
 2188:     Body = binary_to_list(StreamedBody).
 2189: 
 2190: not_streamed_test(Request, To, RequestOpts, Profile) ->
 2191:     {ok, {{_,Code,_}, [_ | _], Body}} =
 2192: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 2193:                       [{body_format, binary} | RequestOpts], Profile),
 2194:     {ok, RequestId} =
 2195: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
 2196:                       [{body_format, binary}, {sync, false}, To | RequestOpts], Profile),
 2197: 
 2198:     receive
 2199: 	{http, {RequestId, {{_, Code, _}, _Headers, Body}}} ->
 2200: 	    {Code, binary_to_list(Body)};
 2201: 	{http, Msg} ->
 2202: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
 2203:     end.
 2204: 
 2205: url(Group, End, Config) when Group == http;
 2206:                              Group == sim_http;
 2207:                              Group == sim_http_process_leak;
 2208:                              Group == http_internal;
 2209:                              Group == http_internal_minimum_bytes ->
 2210:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 2211:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 2212:     ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End;
 2213: url(Group, End, Config) when Group == http_ipv6;
 2214:                              Group == sim_http_ipv6 ->
 2215:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 2216:     ?URL_START ++ "[::1]" ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End;
 2217: url(Group, End, Config) when Group == https;
 2218:                              Group == sim_https ->
 2219:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 2220:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 2221:     ?TLS_URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End.
 2222: 
 2223: url(Group, UserInfo, End, Config) when Group == http;
 2224:                                        Group == sim_http;
 2225:                                        Group == sim_http_process_leak ->
 2226:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 2227:     {ok, Hostname} = inet:gethostname(),
 2228:     ?URL_START ++ UserInfo ++ "@" ++ Hostname ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End;
 2229: url(sim_http_ipv6, UserInfo, End, Config) ->
 2230:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 2231:     ?URL_START ++ UserInfo ++ "@" ++ "[::1]:" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End;
 2232: url(Group, UserInfo, End, Config) when Group == https;
 2233:                                        Group == sim_https ->
 2234:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 2235:     {ok, Hostname} = inet:gethostname(),
 2236:     ?TLS_URL_START ++ UserInfo ++ "@" ++ Hostname ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End.
 2237: 
 2238: % Only for use in the `mixed` test group, where both http and https
 2239: % URLs are possible.
 2240: mixed_url(http, End, Config) ->
 2241:     mixed_url(http_port, End, Config);
 2242: mixed_url(https, End, Config) ->
 2243:     mixed_url(https_port, End, Config);
 2244: mixed_url(PortType, End, Config) ->
 2245:     Port = proplists:get_value(PortType, Config),
 2246:     {ok, Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 2247:     Start = case PortType of
 2248:         http_port -> ?URL_START;
 2249:         https_port -> ?TLS_URL_START
 2250:     end,
 2251:     Start ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End.
 2252: 
 2253: group_name(Config) ->
 2254:     GroupProp = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
 2255:     proplists:get_value(name, GroupProp).
 2256: 
 2257: server_start(Group, _) when Group == sim_http; Group == sim_http_process_leak ->
 2258:     Inet = inet_version(),
 2259:     ok = httpc:set_options([{ipfamily, Inet},{unix_socket, undefined}]),
 2260:     {_Pid, Port} = http_test_lib:dummy_server(ip_comm, Inet, [{content_cb, ?MODULE}]),
 2261:     Port;
 2262: 
 2263: server_start(sim_http_ipv6, _) ->
 2264:     ok = httpc:set_options([{ipfamily, inet6},{unix_socket, undefined}]),
 2265:     {_Pid, Port} = http_test_lib:dummy_server(ip_comm, inet6, [{content_cb, ?MODULE}]),
 2266:     Port;
 2267: 
 2268: server_start(sim_https, SslConfig) ->
 2269:     Inet = inet_version(),
 2270:     ok = httpc:set_options([{ipfamily, Inet},{unix_socket, undefined}]),
 2271:     {_Pid, Port} = http_test_lib:dummy_server(ssl, Inet, [{ssl, SslConfig}, {content_cb, ?MODULE}]),
 2272:     Port;
 2273: 
 2274: server_start(http_unix_socket, Config) ->
 2275:     Inet = local,
 2276:     Socket = proplists:get_value(unix_socket, Config),
 2277:     HttpcOptions = [{ipfamily, Inet},{unix_socket, Socket}],
 2278:     {Pid, Port} = http_test_lib:dummy_server(unix_socket, Inet, [{content_cb, ?MODULE},
 2279:                                                                   {unix_socket, Socket}]),
 2280:     {Pid, Port, HttpcOptions};
 2281: server_start(http_ipv6, HttpdConfig) ->
 2282:     {ok, Pid} = inets:start(httpd, HttpdConfig),
 2283:     Serv = inets:services_info(),
 2284:     {value, {_, _, Info}} = lists:keysearch(Pid, 2, Serv),
 2285:     proplists:get_value(port, Info);
 2286: server_start(sim_mixed, Config) ->
 2287:     % For the mixed http/https case, we start two servers and return both ports.
 2288:     {server_start(sim_http, []), server_start(sim_https, Config)};
 2289: server_start(_, HttpdConfig) ->
 2290:     {ok, Pid} = inets:start(httpd, HttpdConfig),
 2291:     Serv = inets:services_info(),
 2292:     ok = httpc:set_options([{ipfamily, inet_version()},{unix_socket, undefined}]),
 2293:     {value, {_, _, Info}} = lists:keysearch(Pid, 2, Serv),
 2294:     proplists:get_value(port, Info).
 2295: 
 2296: server_config(base, Config) ->
 2297:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2298:     [{port, 0},
 2299:      {server_name,"httpc_test"},
 2300:      {server_root, ServerRoot},
 2301:      {document_root, proplists:get_value(doc_root, Config)},
 2302:      {mime_type, "text/plain"}];
 2303: server_config(base_http, Config) ->
 2304:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2305:     server_config(base, Config) ++
 2306:         [{script_alias,
 2307:           {"/cgi-bin/", filename:join(ServerRoot, "cgi-bin") ++ "/"}}];
 2308: server_config(http, Config) ->
 2309:     server_config(base_http, Config) ++
 2310:         [{bind_address, any},
 2311:          {ipfamily, inet_version()}];
 2312: server_config(http_ipv6, Config) ->
 2313:     server_config(base_http, Config) ++
 2314:         [{bind_address, {0,0,0,0,0,0,0,1}},
 2315:          {ipfamily, inet6}];
 2316: server_config(http_internal, Config) ->
 2317:     server_config(http, Config) ++
 2318:         [{erl_script_alias, {"", [httpc_SUITE]}}];
 2319: server_config(http_internal_minimum_bytes, Config) ->
 2320:     server_config(http_internal, Config) ++
 2321:         [{minimum_bytes_per_second, 100}];
 2322: server_config(https, Config) ->
 2323:     [{socket_type, {ssl, ssl_config(Config)}} | server_config(http, Config)];
 2324: server_config(sim_https, Config) ->
 2325:     ssl_config(Config);
 2326: server_config(http_unix_socket, _Config) ->
 2327:     Socket = ?UNIX_SOCKET,
 2328:     [{unix_socket, Socket}];
 2329: server_config(_, _) ->
 2330:     [].
 2331: 
 2332: esi_post(Sid, _Env, _Input) ->
 2333:     mod_esi:deliver(Sid, ["OK"]).
 2334: 
 2335: start_apps(https) ->
 2336:     inets_test_lib:start_apps([crypto, public_key, ssl]);
 2337: start_apps(sim_https) ->
 2338:     inets_test_lib:start_apps([crypto, public_key, ssl]);
 2339: start_apps(sim_mixed) ->
 2340:     inets_test_lib:start_apps([crypto, public_key, ssl]);
 2341: start_apps(_) ->
 2342:     ok.
 2343: 
 2344: ssl_config(Config) ->
 2345:     SSLConf = proplists:get_value(ssl_conf, Config),
 2346:     proplists:get_value(server_config, SSLConf).
 2347: 
 2348: setup_server_dirs(ServerRoot, DocRoot, DataDir) ->   
 2349:     CgiDir =  filename:join(ServerRoot, "cgi-bin"),
 2350:     ok = file:make_dir(ServerRoot),
 2351:     ok = file:make_dir(DocRoot),
 2352:     ok = file:make_dir(CgiDir),
 2353: 
 2354:     {ok, Files} = file:list_dir(DataDir),
 2355:     
 2356:     lists:foreach(fun(File) -> case lists:suffix(".html", File) of
 2357: 				   true ->
 2358: 				       inets_test_lib:copy_file(File, 
 2359: 								DataDir, 
 2360: 								DocRoot);
 2361: 				   false ->
 2362: 				       ok
 2363: 			       end
 2364: 		  end, Files),
 2365:     
 2366:     Cgi = case os:type() of
 2367: 	      {win32, _} ->
 2368: 		  "cgi_echo.exe";
 2369: 	      _ ->
 2370: 		  "cgi_echo"
 2371: 	  end,
 2372:     
 2373:     {ok, _} = inets_test_lib:copy_file(Cgi, DataDir, CgiDir),
 2374:     AbsCgi = filename:join([CgiDir, Cgi]),
 2375:     {ok, FileInfo} = file:read_file_info(AbsCgi),
 2376:     ok = file:write_file_info(AbsCgi, FileInfo#file_info{mode = 8#00755}).
 2377: 
 2378: 
 2379: keep_alive_requests(Request, Profile) ->
 2380:     {ok, RequestIdA0} =
 2381: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}], Profile),
 2382:     {ok, RequestIdA1} =
 2383: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}], Profile),
 2384:     {ok, RequestIdA2} =
 2385: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}], Profile),
 2386: 
 2387:     receive_replys([RequestIdA0, RequestIdA1, RequestIdA2]),
 2388: 
 2389:     {ok, RequestIdB0} =
 2390: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}], Profile),
 2391:     {ok, RequestIdB1} =
 2392: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}], Profile),
 2393:     {ok, RequestIdB2} =
 2394: 	httpc:request(get, Request, [?SSL_NO_VERIFY], [{sync, false}], Profile),
 2395: 
 2396:     ok = httpc:cancel_request(RequestIdB1, Profile),
 2397:     ct:log("Cancel ~p~n", [RequestIdB1]),
 2398:     receive_replys([RequestIdB0, RequestIdB2]).
 2399: 
 2400: receive_replys([]) ->
 2401:     ok;
 2402: receive_replys([ID|IDs]) ->
 2403:     receive
 2404: 	{http, {ID, {{_, 200, _}, [_|_], _}}} ->
 2405: 	    receive_replys(IDs);
 2406: 	{http, {Other, {{_, 200, _}, [_|_], _}}} ->
 2407: 	    ct:log("~p",[{recived_canceld_id, Other}])
 2408:     end.
 2409: 
 2410: inet_version() ->
 2411:     inet. %% Just run inet for now
 2412:     %% case gen_tcp:listen(0,[inet6]) of
 2413:     %% 	{ok, S} ->
 2414:     %% 	    gen_tcp:close(S),
 2415:     %% 	    inet6;
 2416:     %% 	_ ->
 2417:     %% 	    inet
 2418:     %%end.
 2419: 
 2420: handle_request(Module, Function, Args, Socket) ->
 2421:     case Module:Function(Args) of
 2422: 	{ok, Result} ->
 2423: 	    case handle_http_msg(Result, Socket, []) of
 2424: 		stop ->
 2425: 		    stop;
 2426: 		<<>> ->
 2427: 		    {httpd_request, parse, [[{max_uri,?HTTP_MAX_URI_SIZE},
 2428: 					     {max_header, ?HTTP_MAX_HEADER_SIZE},
 2429: 					     {max_version,?HTTP_MAX_VERSION_STRING}, 
 2430: 					     {max_method, ?HTTP_MAX_METHOD_STRING},
 2431: 					     {max_content_length, ?HTTP_MAX_CONTENT_LENGTH},
 2432: 					     {customize, httpd_custom}
 2433: 					    ]]};
 2434: 		Data ->	
 2435: 		    handle_request(httpd_request, parse, 
 2436: 				   [Data, [{max_uri,    ?HTTP_MAX_URI_SIZE},
 2437: 					   {max_header, ?HTTP_MAX_HEADER_SIZE},
 2438: 					    {max_version,?HTTP_MAX_VERSION_STRING}, 
 2439: 					    {max_method, ?HTTP_MAX_METHOD_STRING},
 2440: 					    {max_content_length, ?HTTP_MAX_CONTENT_LENGTH},
 2441: 					   {customize, httpd_custom}
 2442: 					  ]], Socket)
 2443: 	    end;
 2444: 	NewMFA ->
 2445: 	    NewMFA
 2446:     end.
 2447: 
 2448: handle_http_msg({Method, RelUri, _, {_, Headers}, Body}, Socket, _) ->
 2449:     ct:log("Request: ~p ~p", [Method, RelUri]),
 2450: 
 2451:     NextRequest = 
 2452: 	case RelUri of
 2453: 	    "/dummy_headers.html" ->
 2454: 		<<>>;
 2455: 	    "/no_headers.html" ->
 2456: 		stop;
 2457: 	    "/just_close.html" ->
 2458: 		stop;
 2459: 	    _ ->
 2460: 		ContentLength = content_length(Headers),    
 2461: 		case byte_size(Body) - ContentLength of
 2462: 		    0 ->
 2463: 			<<>>;
 2464: 		    _ ->
 2465: 			<<_BodyThisReq:ContentLength/binary, 
 2466: 			  Next/binary>> = Body,
 2467: 			Next
 2468: 		end
 2469: 	end,
 2470:    
 2471:     case global:trans({cookies, verify}, fun() -> unset end, [node()], 0) of
 2472:         aborted->
 2473:             % somebody has the lock and wants us to check
 2474:             check_cookie(Headers);
 2475:         unset ->
 2476:             ok
 2477:     end,
 2478: 
 2479:    {ok, {_, Port}} = sockname(Socket),
 2480: 
 2481: 
 2482:     DefaultResponse = "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\r\n" ++
 2483: 	"Content-Length:32\r\n\r\n"
 2484: 	"<HTML><BODY>foobar</BODY></HTML>",
 2485: 
 2486:     Msg = handle_uri(Method,RelUri, Port, Headers, Socket, DefaultResponse),
 2487: 
 2488:     case Msg of
 2489: 	ok ->
 2490: 	    ok;
 2491: 	close ->
 2492: 	    %% Nothing to send, just close
 2493: 	    close(Socket);
 2494: 	_ when is_list(Msg) orelse is_binary(Msg) ->
 2495: 	    case Msg of
 2496: 		[] ->
 2497: 		    ct:log("Empty Msg", []);
 2498: 		_ ->
 2499: 		    ct:log("Response: ~p", [Msg]),
 2500: 		    send(Socket, Msg)
 2501: 	    end
 2502:     end,
 2503:     NextRequest.
 2504: 
 2505: ensure_host_header_with_port([]) ->
 2506:     false;
 2507: ensure_host_header_with_port([{"host", Host}| _]) ->
 2508:     case string:tokens(Host, [$:]) of
 2509: 	[_ActualHost, _Port] ->
 2510: 	    true;
 2511: 	_ ->
 2512: 	    false
 2513:     end;
 2514: ensure_host_header_with_port([_|T]) ->
 2515:     ensure_host_header_with_port(T).
 2516: 
 2517: auth_header([]) ->
 2518:     auth_header_not_found;
 2519: auth_header([{"authorization", Value} | _]) ->
 2520:     {ok, string:strip(Value)};
 2521: auth_header([_ | Tail]) ->
 2522:     auth_header(Tail).
 2523: 
 2524: content_type_header([]) ->
 2525:     not_found;
 2526: content_type_header([{"content-type", Value}|_]) ->
 2527:     {ok, string:strip(Value)};
 2528: content_type_header([_|T]) ->
 2529:     content_type_header(T).
 2530: 
 2531: handle_auth("Basic " ++ UserInfo, Challenge, DefaultResponse) ->
 2532:     case string:tokens(base64:decode_to_string(UserInfo), ":") of
 2533: 	["alladin", "sesame"] = Auth ->
 2534: 	    ct:log("Auth: ~p~n", [Auth]),
 2535: 	    DefaultResponse;
 2536: 	Other ->
 2537: 	    ct:log("UnAuth: ~p~n", [Other]),
 2538: 	    Challenge
 2539:     end.
 2540: 
 2541: check_cookie([]) ->
 2542:     ct:fail(no_cookie_header);
 2543: check_cookie([{"cookie", _} | _]) ->
 2544:     ok;
 2545: check_cookie([_Head | Tail]) ->
 2546:    check_cookie(Tail).
 2547: 
 2548: content_length([]) ->
 2549:     0;
 2550: content_length([{"content-length", Value}|_]) ->
 2551:     list_to_integer(string:strip(Value));
 2552: content_length([_Head | Tail]) ->
 2553:    content_length(Tail).
 2554: 
 2555: handle_uri("GET","/dummy.html?foo=bar",_,_,_,_) ->
 2556:     "HTTP/1.0 200 OK\r\n\r\nTEST";
 2557: 
 2558: handle_uri("GET","/space%20.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2559:     Body = "<HTML><BODY>foobar</BODY></HTML>",
 2560:     "HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\n" ++
 2561:         "Content-Length:" ++ integer_to_list(length(Body)) ++ "\r\n\r\n" ++
 2562:         Body;
 2563: 
 2564: handle_uri(_,"/just_close.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2565: 		close;
 2566: handle_uri(_,"/no_content.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2567:     "HTTP/1.0 204 No Content\r\n\r\n";
 2568: 
 2569: handle_uri(_,"/no_headers.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2570:     "HTTP/1.0 200 OK\r\n\r\nTEST";
 2571: 
 2572: handle_uri("TRACE","/trace.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2573:     Body = "TRACE /trace.html simulate HTTP TRACE ",
 2574:     "HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\n" ++ "Content-Length:" ++ integer_to_list(length(Body)) ++ "\r\n\r\n" ++ Body;
 2575: 
 2576: handle_uri(_,"/ensure_host_header_with_port.html",_,Headers,_,_) ->
 2577:     case ensure_host_header_with_port(Headers) of
 2578: 	true ->
 2579: 	    B =
 2580: 		"<HTML><BODY>" ++
 2581: 		"host with port" ++
 2582: 		"</BODY></HTML>",
 2583: 	    Len = integer_to_list(length(B)),
 2584: 	    "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\r\n" ++
 2585: 		"Content-Length:" ++ Len ++ "\r\n\r\n" ++ B;
 2586: 	false ->
 2587: 	    B =
 2588: 		"<HTML><BODY>" ++
 2589: 		"Internal Server Error - host without port" ++
 2590: 		"</BODY></HTML>",
 2591: 	    Len = integer_to_list(length(B)),
 2592: 	    "HTTP/1.1 500 Internal Server Error\r\n" ++
 2593: 		"Content-Length:" ++ Len ++ "\r\n\r\n" ++ B
 2594:     end;
 2595: handle_uri(_,"/redirect_ensure_host_header_with_port.html",Port,_,Socket,_) ->
 2596:     NewUri = url_start(Socket) ++
 2597: 	integer_to_list(Port) ++ "/ensure_host_header_with_port.html",
 2598:     "HTTP/1.1 302 Found \r\n" ++
 2599: 	"Location:" ++ NewUri ++  "\r\n" ++
 2600: 	"Content-Length:0\r\n\r\n";
 2601: 
 2602: handle_uri(_,"/300.html",Port,_,Socket,_) ->
 2603:     NewUri = url_start(Socket) ++
 2604: 	integer_to_list(Port) ++ "/dummy.html",
 2605:   Body = "<HTML><BODY><a href=" ++ NewUri ++
 2606: 	">New place</a></BODY></HTML>",
 2607:     "HTTP/1.1 300 Multiple Choices\r\n" ++
 2608: 	"Location:" ++ NewUri ++  "\r\n" ++
 2609: 	"Content-Length:" ++ integer_to_list(length(Body))
 2610: 	++ "\r\n\r\n" ++ Body;
 2611:

 2728: handle_uri(_,"/500.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2729:     "HTTP/1.1 500 Internal Server Error\r\n" ++
 2730: 	"Content-Length:47\r\n\r\n" ++
 2731: 	"<HTML><BODY>Internal Server Error</BODY></HTML>";
 2732: 
 2733: handle_uri(_,"/503.html",_,_,_,DefaultResponse) ->
 2734:     case ets:lookup(unavailable, 503) of
 2735: 	[{503, unavailable}] ->
 2736: 	    ets:insert(unavailable, {503, available}),
 2737: 	    "HTTP/1.1 503 Service Unavailable\r\n" ++
 2738: 		"Retry-After:5\r\n" ++
 2739: 		"Content-Length:47\r\n\r\n" ++
 2740: 		"<HTML><BODY>Internal Server Error</BODY></HTML>";
 2741: 	[{503, available}]   ->
 2742: 	    DefaultResponse;
 2743: 	[{503, long_unavailable}]  ->
 2744: 	    "HTTP/1.1 503 Service Unavailable\r\n" ++
 2745: 		"Retry-After:120\r\n" ++
 2746: 		"Content-Length:47\r\n\r\n" ++
 2747: 		"<HTML><BODY>Internal Server Error</BODY></HTML>"
 2748:     end;
 2749: 
 2750: handle_uri(_,"/redirectloop.html",Port,_,Socket,_) ->
 2751:     %% Create a potential endless loop!
 2752:     NewUri = url_start(Socket) ++
 2753: 	integer_to_list(Port) ++ "/redirectloop.html",
 2754:      Body = "<HTML><BODY><a href=" ++ NewUri ++
 2755: 	">New place</a></BODY></HTML>",
 2756:     "HTTP/1.1 300 Multiple Choices\r\n" ++
 2757: 	"Location:" ++ NewUri ++  "\r\n" ++
 2758: 	"Content-Length:" ++ integer_to_list(length(Body))
 2759: 	++ "\r\n\r\n" ++ Body;
 2760: 
 2761: handle_uri(_,"/userinfo.html", _,Headers,_, DefaultResponse) ->
 2762:     Challenge = "HTTP/1.1 401 Unauthorized \r\n" ++
 2763: 	"WWW-Authenticate:Basic" ++"\r\n" ++
 2764: 	"Content-Length:0\r\n\r\n",
 2765:     case auth_header(Headers) of
 2766: 	{ok, Value} ->
 2767: 	    handle_auth(Value, Challenge, DefaultResponse);
 2768: 	_ ->
 2769: 	    Challenge
 2770:     end;
 2771: 
 2772: handle_uri(_,"/dummy_headers.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2773:     %% The client will only care about the Transfer-Encoding
 2774:     %% header the rest of these headers are left to the
 2775:     %% user to evaluate. This is not a valid response
 2776:     %% it only tests that the header handling code works.
 2777:     Head = "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\r\n" ++
 2778: 	"Pragma:1#no-cache\r\n"  ++
 2779: 	"Via:1.0 fred, 1.1 nowhere.com (Apache/1.1)\r\n"  ++
 2780: 	"Warning:1#pseudonym foobar\r\n"  ++
 2781: 	"Vary:*\r\n"  ++
 2782: 	"Trailer:Other:inets_test\r\n"  ++
 2783: 	"Upgrade:HTTP/2.0\r\n"  ++
 2784: 	"Age:4711\r\n" ++
 2785: 	"Transfer-Encoding:chunked\r\n" ++
 2786: 	"Content-Encoding:foo\r\n" ++
 2787: 	"Content-Language:en\r\n"  ++
 2788: 	"Content-Location:http://www.foobar.se\r\n"  ++
 2789: 	"Content-MD5:104528739076276072743283077410617235478\r\n"
 2790: 	++
 2791: 	"Content-Range:Sat, 29 Oct 1994 19:43:31 GMT\r\n"  ++
 2792: 	"Expires:Sat, 29 Oct 1994 19:43:31 GMT\r\n"  ++
 2793: 	"Proxy-Authenticate:#1Basic"  ++
 2794: 	"\r\n\r\n",
 2795:     send(Socket, Head),
 2796:     send(Socket, http_chunk:encode("<HTML><BODY>fo")),
 2797:     send(Socket, http_chunk:encode("obar</BODY></HTML>")),
 2798:     http_chunk:encode_last();
 2799: 
 2800: handle_uri(_,"/obs_folded_headers.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2801:     "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\r\n"
 2802:     "Content-Length:5\r\n"
 2803:     "Folded: a\r\n"
 2804:     " b\r\n\r\n"
 2805:     "Hello";

 2898: handle_uri(_,"/http_1_0_no_length_single.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2899:     Body = "HTTP/1.0 200 ok\r\n"

 2905: handle_uri(_,"/http_1_0_no_length_multiple.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2906:     Head = "HTTP/1.0 200 ok\r\n"
 2907:         "Content-type:text/plain\r\n\r\n"
 2908:         "multiple packets, ",
 2909:     send(Socket, Head),
 2910:     %% long body to make sure it will be sent in multiple tcp packets
 2911:     send(Socket, string:copies("other multiple packets ", 200)),
 2912:     close(Socket);
 2913: 
 2914: handle_uri(_,"/large_404_response.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2915:     %% long body to make sure it will be sent in multiple tcp packets
 2916:     Body = string:copies("other multiple packets ", 200),
 2917:     Head = io_lib:format("HTTP/1.1 404 not found\r\n"
 2918:                          "Content-length: ~B\r\n"
 2919:                          "Content-type: text/plain\r\n\r\n",
 2920:                          [length(Body)]),
 2921:     send(Socket, Head),
 2922:     send(Socket, Body),
 2923:     close(Socket);
 2924: 
 2925: handle_uri(_,"/once.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2926:     Head =  "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\r\n" ++
 2927: 	"Content-Length:32\r\n\r\n",
 2928:     send(Socket, Head),
 2929:     send(Socket, "<HTML><BODY>fo"),
 2930:     ct:sleep(1000),
 2931:     send(Socket, "ob"),
 2932:     ct:sleep(1000),
 2933:     send(Socket, "ar</BODY></HTML>");
 2934: 
 2935: handle_uri(_,"/invalid_http.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2936:     "HTTP/1.1 301\r\nDate:Sun, 09 Dec 2007 13:04:18 GMT\r\n" ++
 2937: 	"Transfer-Encoding:chunked\r\n\r\n";
 2938: 
 2939: handle_uri(_,"/invalid_chunk_size.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2940:     "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\r\n" ++
 2941: 	"Transfer-Encoding:chunked\r\n\r\nåäö\r\n";
 2942: 
 2943: handle_uri(_,"/missing_reason_phrase.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2944:     "HTTP/1.1 200\r\n" ++
 2945: 	"Content-Length: 32\r\n\r\n"
 2946: 	"<HTML><BODY>foobar</BODY></HTML>";
 2947: 
 2948: handle_uri(_,"/missing_CR.html",_,_,_,_) ->
 2949:     "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\n" ++
 2950: 	"Content-Length:32\r\n\n" ++
 2951: 	"<HTML><BODY>foobar</BODY></HTML>";
 2952: 
 2953: handle_uri(_,"/multipart_chunks.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2954:     Head = "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\r\n" ++
 2955: 	"Transfer-Encoding:chunked\r\n" ++
 2956: 	"Date: " ++ httpd_util:rfc1123_date() ++ "\r\n"
 2957: 	"Connection: Keep-Alive\r\n" ++
 2958: 	"Content-Type: multipart/x-mixed-replace; boundary=chunk_boundary\r\n" ++
 2959: 	"\r\n",
 2960:     send(Socket, Head),
 2961:     send_multipart_chunks(Socket),
 2962:     http_chunk:encode_last();
 2963: handle_uri(_,"/delay_close.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2964:     ct:sleep(10000),
 2965:     close(Socket);
 2966: handle_uri("HEAD",_,_,_,_,_) ->
 2967:     "HTTP/1.1 200 ok\r\n" ++
 2968: 	"Content-Length:0\r\n\r\n";
 2969: handle_uri("PUT","/v1/kv/foo",_,_,_,_) ->
 2970:     "HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\n" ++
 2971:         "Date: Tue, 20 Feb 2018 14:39:08 GMT\r\n" ++
 2972:         "Content-Length: 5\r\n\r\n" ++
 2973:         "Content-Type: application/json\r\n\r\n" ++
 2974:         "true\n";
 2975: handle_uri("GET","/v1/kv/foo",_,_,_,_) ->
 2976:     "HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\n" ++
 2977:         "Date: Tue, 20 Feb 2018 14:39:08 GMT\r\n" ++
 2978:         "Content-Length: 24\r\n" ++
 2979:         "Content-Type: application/json\r\n\r\n" ++
 2980:         "[{\"Value\": \"aGVsbG8=\"}]\n";
 2981: handle_uri(_,"/http_1_1_send_oct.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2982:     "HTTP/1.1 204 No Content\r\n" ++
 2983:         "X-Socket-Stat-Send-Oct: " ++ integer_to_list(get_stat(Socket, send_oct)) ++ "\r\n" ++
 2984:         "\r\n";
 2985: handle_uri(_,"/http_1_1_send_oct_and_connection_close.html",_,_,Socket,_) ->
 2986:     "HTTP/1.1 204 No Content\r\n" ++
 2987:         "X-Socket-Stat-Send-Oct: " ++ integer_to_list(get_stat(Socket, send_oct)) ++ "\r\n" ++
 2988:         "Connection: close\r\n" ++
 2989:         "\r\n";
 2990: handle_uri(_,"/delete_no_body.html", _,Headers,_, DefaultResponse) ->
 2991:     Error = "HTTP/1.1 500 Internal Server Error\r\n" ++
 2992: 	"Content-Length:0\r\n\r\n",
 2993:     case content_type_header(Headers) of
 2994: 	{ok, _} ->
 2995: 	    Error;
 2996: 	not_found ->
 2997: 	    DefaultResponse
 2998:     end;
 2999: handle_uri(_,_,_,_,_,DefaultResponse) ->
 3000:     DefaultResponse.
 3001: 
 3002: get_stat(S, Opt) ->
 3003:     case getstat(S, [Opt]) of
 3004:         {ok, [{Opt, V}]} when is_integer(V) ->
 3005:             V;
 3006:         {error, _} = E ->
 3007:             E
 3008:     end.
 3009: 
 3010: getstat(#sslsocket{} = S, Opts) ->
 3011:     ssl:getstat(S, Opts);
 3012: getstat(S, Opts) ->
 3013:     inet:getstat(S, Opts).
 3014: 
 3015: url_start(#sslsocket{}) ->
 3016:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 3017:     ?TLS_URL_START ++ Host ++ ":";
 3018: url_start(_) ->
 3019:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 3020:     ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":".
 3021: 
 3022: send(#sslsocket{} = S, Msg) ->
 3023:     ssl:send(S, Msg);
 3024: send(S, Msg) ->
 3025:     gen_tcp:send(S, Msg).
 3026: 
 3027: close(#sslsocket{} = S) ->
 3028:     ssl:close(S);
 3029: close(S) ->
 3030:     gen_tcp:close(S).
 3031: 
 3032: sockname(#sslsocket{}= S) ->
 3033:     ssl:sockname(S);
 3034: sockname(S) ->
 3035:     inet:sockname(S).
 3036: 
 3037: receive_streamed_body(RequestId, Body) ->
 3038:     receive
 3039: 	{http, {RequestId, stream, BinBodyPart}} ->
 3040: 	    receive_streamed_body(RequestId,
 3041: 				  <<Body/binary, BinBodyPart/binary>>);
 3042: 	{http, {RequestId, stream_end, _Headers}} ->
 3043: 	    Body;
 3044: 	{http, Msg} ->
 3045: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
 3046:     end.
 3047: 
 3048: receive_streamed_body(RequestId, Body, Pid) ->
 3049:     httpc:stream_next(Pid),
 3050:     ct:log("~p:receive_streamed_body -> requested next stream ~n", [?MODULE]),
 3051:     receive
 3052: 	{http, {RequestId, stream, BinBodyPart}} ->
 3053: 	    %% Make sure the httpc hasn't sent us the next 'stream'
 3054: 	    %% without our request.
 3055: 	    receive
 3056: 		{http, {RequestId, stream, _}} = Msg ->
 3057: 		    ct:fail({unexpected_flood_of_stream, Msg})
 3058: 	    after
 3059: 		1000 ->
 3060: 		    ok
 3061: 	    end,
 3062: 	    receive_streamed_body(RequestId,
 3063: 				  <<Body/binary, BinBodyPart/binary>>,
 3064: 				  Pid);
 3065: 	{http, {RequestId, stream_end, _Headers}} ->
 3066: 	    Body;
 3067: 	{http, Msg} ->
 3068: 	    ct:fail(Msg)
 3069:     end.
 3070: 
 3071: %% -----------------------------------------------------
 3072: %% A sequence number handler
 3073: %% The purpose is to be able to pair requests with responses.
 3074: 
 3075: start_sequence_number_server() ->
 3076:     proc_lib:spawn(fun() -> loop_sequence_number(1) end).
 3077: 
 3078: loop_sequence_number(N) ->
 3079:     receive
 3080: 	shutdown ->
 3081: 	    ok;
 3082: 	{From, get_next} ->
 3083: 	    From ! {next_is, N},
 3084: 	    loop_sequence_number(N + 1)
 3085:     end.
 3086: 
 3087: get_next_sequence_number(SeqNumServer) ->
 3088:     SeqNumServer ! {self(), get_next},
 3089:     receive {next_is, N} -> N end.
 3090: 
 3091: %% -----------------------------------------------------
 3092: %% Client part
 3093: %% Sends requests randomly parallel
 3094: 
 3095: run_clients(NumClients, ServerPort, SeqNumServer) ->
 3096:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 3097:     set_random_seed(),
 3098:     lists:map(
 3099:       fun(Id) ->
 3100: 	      Req = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("req~3..0w", [get_next_sequence_number(SeqNumServer)])),
 3101: 	      Url = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(ServerPort) ++  "/" ++ Req,
 3102: 	      Pid = proc_lib:spawn(
 3103: 		      fun() ->
 3104: 			      case httpc:request(Url) of
 3105: 				  {ok, {{_,200,_}, _, Resp}} ->
 3106: 				      ct:log("[~w] 200 response: "
 3107: 					       "~p~n", [Id, Resp]),
 3108: 				      case lists:prefix(Req++"->", Resp) of
 3109: 					  true -> exit(normal);
 3110: 					  false -> exit({bad_resp,Req,Resp})
 3111: 				      end;
 3112: 				  {ok, {{_,EC,Reason},_,Resp}}  ->
 3113: 				      ct:log("[~w] ~w response: "
 3114: 					       "~s~n~s~n",
 3115: 					       [Id, EC, Reason, Resp]),
 3116: 				      exit({bad_resp,Req,Resp});
 3117: 				  Crap ->
 3118: 				      ct:log("[~w] bad response: ~p",
 3119: 					       [Id, Crap]),
 3120: 				      exit({bad_resp, Req, Crap})
 3121: 			      end
 3122: 		      end),
 3123: 	      MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 3124: 	      timer:sleep(10 + rand:uniform(1334)),
 3125: 	      {Id, Pid, MRef}
 3126:       end,
 3127:       lists:seq(1, NumClients)).
 3128: 
 3129: wait4clients([], _Timeout) ->
 3130:     ok;
 3131: wait4clients(Clients, Timeout) when Timeout > 0 ->
 3132:     Time = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 3133: 
 3134:     receive
 3135: 	{'DOWN', _MRef, process, Pid, normal} ->
 3136: 	    {value, {Id, _, _}} = lists:keysearch(Pid, 2, Clients),
 3137: 	    NewClients = lists:keydelete(Id, 1, Clients),
 3138: 	    wait4clients(NewClients, Timeout - inets_lib:millisec_passed(Time));
 3139: 	{'DOWN', _MRef, process, Pid, Reason} ->
 3140: 	    {value, {Id, _, _}} = lists:keysearch(Pid, 2, Clients),
 3141: 	    ct:fail({bad_client_termination, Id, Reason})
 3142:     after Timeout ->
 3143: 	    ct:fail({client_timeout, Clients})
 3144:     end;
 3145: wait4clients(Clients, _) ->
 3146:     ct:fail({client_timeout, Clients}).
 3147: 
 3148: 
 3149: %% -----------------------------------------------------
 3150: %% Webserver part:
 3151: %% Implements a web server that sends responses one character
 3152: %% at a time, with random delays between the characters.
 3153: 
 3154: start_slow_server(SeqNumServer) ->
 3155:     proc_lib:start(
 3156:       erlang, apply, [fun() -> init_slow_server(SeqNumServer) end, []]).
 3157: 
 3158: init_slow_server(SeqNumServer) ->
 3159:     Inet = inet_version(),
 3160:     {ok, LSock} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [binary, Inet, {packet,0}, {active,true},
 3161: 				     {backlog, 100}]),
 3162:     {ok, {_IP, Port}} = inet:sockname(LSock),
 3163:     proc_lib:init_ack({ok, self(), Port}),
 3164:     loop_slow_server(LSock, SeqNumServer).
 3165: 
 3166: loop_slow_server(LSock, SeqNumServer) ->
 3167:     Master = self(),
 3168:     Acceptor = proc_lib:spawn(
 3169: 		 fun() -> client_handler(Master, LSock, SeqNumServer) end),
 3170:     receive
 3171: 	{accepted, Acceptor} ->
 3172: 	    loop_slow_server(LSock, SeqNumServer);
 3173: 	shutdown ->
 3174: 	    gen_tcp:close(LSock),
 3175: 	    exit(Acceptor, kill)
 3176:     end.
 3177: 
 3178: 
 3179: %% Handle one client connection
 3180: client_handler(Master, LSock, SeqNumServer) ->
 3181:     {ok, CSock} = gen_tcp:accept(LSock),
 3182:     Master ! {accepted, self()},
 3183:     set_random_seed(),
 3184:     loop_client(1, CSock, SeqNumServer).
 3185: 
 3186: loop_client(N, CSock, SeqNumServer) ->
 3187:     %% Await request, don't bother parsing it too much,
 3188:     %% assuming the entire request arrives in one packet.
 3189:     receive
 3190: 	{tcp, CSock, Req} ->
 3191: 	    ReqNum = parse_req_num(Req),
 3192: 	    RespSeqNum = get_next_sequence_number(SeqNumServer),
 3193: 	    Response = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~s->resp~3..0w/~2..0w", [ReqNum, RespSeqNum, N])),
 3194: 	    Txt = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("Slow server (~p) got ~p, answering with ~p",
 3195: 					      [self(), Req, Response])),
 3196: 	    ct:log("~s...~n", [Txt]),
 3197: 	    slowly_send_response(CSock, Response),
 3198: 	    case parse_connection_type(Req) of
 3199: 		keep_alive ->
 3200: 		    ct:log("~s...done~n", [Txt]),
 3201: 		    loop_client(N+1, CSock, SeqNumServer);
 3202: 		close ->
 3203: 		    ct:log("~s...done (closing)~n", [Txt]),
 3204: 		    gen_tcp:close(CSock)
 3205: 	    end
 3206:     end.
 3207: 
 3208: slowly_send_response(CSock, Answer) ->
 3209:     Response =  lists:flatten(io_lib:format("HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\nContent-Length: ~w\r\n\r\n~s",
 3210: 					    [length(Answer), Answer])),
 3211:     lists:foreach(
 3212:       fun(Char) ->
 3213: 	      timer:sleep(rand:uniform(500)),
 3214: 	      gen_tcp:send(CSock, <<Char>>)
 3215:       end,
 3216:       Response).
 3217: 
 3218: parse_req_num(Request) ->
 3219:     Opts = [caseless,{capture,all_but_first,list}],
 3220:     {match, [ReqNum]} = re:run(Request, "GET /(.*) HTTP", Opts),
 3221:     ReqNum.
 3222: 
 3223: parse_connection_type(Request) ->
 3224:     Opts = [caseless,{capture,all_but_first,list}],
 3225:     {match,[CType]} = re:run(Request, "connection: *(keep-alive|close)", Opts),
 3226:     case string:to_lower(CType) of
 3227: 	"close" -> close;
 3228: 	"keep-alive" -> keep_alive
 3229:     end.
 3230: 
 3231: set_random_seed() ->
 3232:     Unique = erlang:unique_integer(),
 3233:     A = erlang:phash2([make_ref(), self(), Unique]),
 3234:     rand:seed(exsplus, {A, A, A}).
 3235: 
 3236: 
 3237: otp_8739(doc) ->
 3238:     ["OTP-8739"];
 3239: otp_8739(suite) ->
 3240:     [];
 3241: otp_8739(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3242:     {_DummyServerPid, Port} = otp_8739_dummy_server(),
 3243:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 3244:     URL = ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ "/dummy.html",
 3245:     Method      = get,
 3246:     Request     = {URL, []},
 3247:     HttpOptions = [{connect_timeout, 500}, {timeout, 1}],
 3248:     Options     = [{sync, true}],
 3249:     Profile     = ?profile(Config),
 3250:     case httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOptions, Options, Profile) of
 3251: 	{error, timeout} ->
 3252: 	    %% And now we check the size of the handler db
 3253: 	    Info = httpc:info(),
 3254: 	    ct:log("Info: ~p", [Info]),
 3255: 	    {value, {handlers, Handlers}} =
 3256: 		lists:keysearch(handlers, 1, Info),
 3257: 	    case Handlers of
 3258: 		[] ->
 3259: 		    ok;
 3260: 		_ ->
 3261: 		    ct:fail({unexpected_handlers, Handlers})
 3262: 	    end;
 3263: 	Unexpected ->
 3264: 	    ct:fail({unexpected, Unexpected})
 3265:     end.
 3266: 
 3267: otp_8739_dummy_server() ->
 3268:     Parent = self(),
 3269:     Pid = spawn_link(fun() -> otp_8739_dummy_server_init(Parent) end),
 3270:     receive
 3271: 	{port, Port} ->
 3272: 	    {Pid, Port}
 3273:     end.
 3274: 
 3275: otp_8739_dummy_server_init(Parent) ->
 3276:     Inet = inet_version(),
 3277:     {ok, ListenSocket} =
 3278: 	gen_tcp:listen(0, [binary, Inet, {packet, 0},
 3279: 			   {reuseaddr,true},
 3280: 			   {active, false}]),
 3281:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(ListenSocket),
 3282:     Parent ! {port, Port},
 3283:     otp_8739_dummy_server_main(Parent, ListenSocket).
 3284: 
 3285: otp_8739_dummy_server_main(_Parent, ListenSocket) ->
 3286:     case gen_tcp:accept(ListenSocket) of
 3287: 	{ok, Sock} ->
 3288: 	    %% Ignore the request, and simply wait for the socket to close
 3289: 	    receive
 3290: 		{tcp_closed, Sock} ->
 3291: 		    (catch gen_tcp:close(ListenSocket)),
 3292: 		    exit(normal);
 3293: 		{tcp_error, Sock, Reason} ->
 3294: 		    ct:fail("socket error: ~p", [Reason]),
 3295: 		    (catch gen_tcp:close(ListenSocket)),
 3296: 		    exit(normal)
 3297: 	    after 10000 ->
 3298: 		    %% Just in case
 3299: 		    (catch gen_tcp:close(Sock)),
 3300: 		    (catch gen_tcp:close(ListenSocket)),
 3301: 		    exit(timeout)
 3302: 	    end;
 3303: 	Error ->
 3304: 	    exit(Error)
 3305:     end.
 3306: 
 3307: send_multipart_chunks(Socket) ->
 3308:     send(Socket, http_chunk:encode("--chunk_boundary\r\n")),
 3309:     send(Socket, http_chunk:encode("Content-Type: text/plain\r\nContent-Length: 4\r\n\r\n")),
 3310:     send(Socket, http_chunk:encode("test\r\n")),
 3311:     ct:sleep(500),
 3312:     send_multipart_chunks(Socket).
 3313: 
 3314: receive_stream_n(_, 0) ->
 3315:     ok;
 3316: receive_stream_n(Ref, N) ->
 3317:     receive
 3318: 	{http, {Ref, stream_start, _}} ->
 3319: 	    receive_stream_n(Ref, N);
 3320: 	{http, {Ref,stream, Data}} ->
 3321: 	    ct:log("Data:  ~p", [Data]),
 3322: 	    receive_stream_n(Ref, N-1)
 3323:     end.
 3324: 
 3325: is_ipv6_supported() ->
 3326:     {ok, Hostname0} = inet:gethostname(),
 3327:     try 
 3328:         lists:member(list_to_atom(Hostname0), ct:get_config(ipv6_hosts))
 3329:     catch
 3330:          _: _ ->
 3331:             false
 3332:     end.
